trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for the <c>ThisWorkbook</c> class in document-level projects for Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Microsoft Office Excel 的文档级项目中的 <c>ThisWorkbook</c> 类的基类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase> class is the base class for the `ThisWorkbook` class in document-level Excel projects created by using Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>类是适用于基`ThisWorkbook`通过使用 Visual Studio 创建的文档级 Excel 项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Use the `ThisWorkbook` class to programmatically access the workbook in your project.
trans-unit.target: 使用`ThisWorkbook`类以编程方式访问你的项目中的工作簿。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase> class provides the same members as the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook?displayProperty=fullName> object in the Excel primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features:
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>类提供相同的成员<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook?displayProperty=fullName>Excel 主互操作程序集，但前者的对象将添加以下功能：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.VstoSmartTags%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.VstoSmartTags%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to add smart tags to a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性添加到工作簿的智能标记。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.InnerObject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.InnerObject%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get the underlying <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook?displayProperty=fullName> object for a workbook host item.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来获取基础<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook?displayProperty=fullName>工作簿主机项的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RemoveCustomization%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RemoveCustomization%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the Office customization assembly from the workbook in a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法从文档级自定义项中的工作簿中删除 Office 自定义程序集。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonObjects%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonObjects%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you added multiple custom Ribbons to your project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template, and you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法，如果你添加到你的项目通过使用多个自定义功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项模板，并且想要指定运行时在显示的功能区。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.GetAutomationObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.GetAutomationObject%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to expose a class in your project to VBA code in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法，以公开您的项目与工作簿中的 VBA 代码中的类。

trans-unit.source: Creating Workbook Host Items
trans-unit.target: 创建工作簿主机项

trans-unit.source: You cannot create <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase> objects programmatically in Office projects.
trans-unit.target: 无法创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>以编程方式在 Office 项目中的对象。

trans-unit.source: In document-level projects, the `ThisWorkbook` class (which derives from <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>) is instantiated automatically by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] when the end user opens the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 在文档级项目中，`ThisWorkbook`类 (它派生自<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>) 自动实例化[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]当最终用户打开工作簿。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。

trans-unit.source: In application-level projects, you can create workbook host items programmatically by using the `GetVstoObject` method.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级项目中，你可以创建工作簿主机项以编程方式使用`GetVstoObject`方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: [Host Items and Host Controls Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md)
trans-unit.target: [主机项和主机控件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md)

trans-unit.source: [Workbook Host Item](/visualstudio/vsto/workbook-host-item.md)
trans-unit.target: [工作簿主机项](/visualstudio/vsto/workbook-host-item.md)

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime" /> values that specifies when the changes to be accepted were made.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime" /> 值中的一个，指定要接受的更改是在何时进行的。

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies who made the changes to be accepted.
trans-unit.target: 一个标识进行要接受的更改的人的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Can be "Everyone", "Everyone but Me", or the name of one of the users of the shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 可以是“Everyone”、“Everyone but Me”或共享工作簿的用户名之一。

trans-unit.source: An A1-style range reference that specifies the location of the changes to be accepted.
trans-unit.target: 指定要接受的更改的位置的 A1 样式范围引用。

trans-unit.source: Accepts all changes in the shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 接受共享工作簿中的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether certain worksheet functions use the latest accuracy algorithms to calculate their results.
trans-unit.target: 指定特定工作表函数是否使用最新精度算法来计算其结果。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether certain worksheet functions use the latest accuracy algorithms to calculate their results.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定特定工作表函数是否使用最新精度算法来计算其结果的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, some of the worksheet functions from Excel 2007 and earlier versions of Excel use new algorithms that increase their accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，工作表函数，从 Excel 2007 及更早版本的 Excel 使用新的算法，可提高其准确性。

trans-unit.source: However, in some cases, the new algorithms decrease the performance of these functions relative to their performance in Excel 2007 and earlier versions of Excel.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在某些情况下，新的算法会降低这些函数相对于 Excel 2007 中其性能的性能和早期版本的 Excel。

trans-unit.source: To specify that these worksheet functions use the older algorithms to increase their performance, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AccuracyVersion%2A> property to 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定这些工作表函数使用旧算法以提高其性能，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AccuracyVersion%2A>属性设置为 1。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible settings for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AccuracyVersion%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的可能设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AccuracyVersion%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting
trans-unit.target: 设置

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Use the latest, most accurate algorithms (default)
trans-unit.target: 使用最新、 最准确地算法 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: Use Excel 2007 or earlier version algorithms
trans-unit.target: 使用 Excel 2007 或更早版本算法

trans-unit.source: Use Excel 2010 algorithms
trans-unit.target: 使用 Excel 2010 算法

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AccuracyVersion%2A> property to a value other than 0, 1, or 2 will result in undefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AccuracyVersion%2A>为 0、 1 或 2 以外的值的属性将导致未定义的行为。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes which functions are affected by setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AccuracyVersion%2A> property to 1.
trans-unit.target: 下表总结了哪些功能受设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AccuracyVersion%2A>属性设置为 1。

trans-unit.source: The functions that are listed in the "Functions not affected" column will always use the latest accuracy algorithms or were not changed in Excel 2010.
trans-unit.target: "函数不影响"列中列出的函数将始终使用最新的准确性算法或 Excel 2010 中未更改。

trans-unit.source: For function names that include a period (.) in their names, to determine the name of the corresponding function implemented in VBA as a method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorksheetFunction> object, substitute the underscore character ( _ ) for the period.
trans-unit.target: 有关在其名称中包含一个句点 （.） 的函数名称，以确定相应的函数的名称在中 VBA 作为实现的方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorksheetFunction>对象，请用下划线字符 (_) 代替时间段。

trans-unit.source: For example, the VBA method that corresponds to the BETA.DIST function is the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorksheetFunction.BetaDist%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对应于 BETA VBA 方法。DIST 函数是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorksheetFunction.BetaDist%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此属性将出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

trans-unit.source: Activates the first window associated with the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 激活工作簿的第一个关联窗口。

trans-unit.source: This does not run any Auto_Activate or Auto_Deactivate macros that might be attached to the workbook (use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RunAutoMacros%2A> method to run those macros).
trans-unit.target: 这不会运行可能会附加到工作簿任何 Auto_Activate 或 Auto_Deactivate 宏 (使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RunAutoMacros%2A>方法来运行这些宏)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workbook is activated.
trans-unit.target: 在激活工作簿时发生。

trans-unit.source: When you switch between two windows showing the same workbook, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WindowActivate> event occurs, but the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ActivateEvent> event for the workbook does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 当你显示相同的工作簿的两个窗口之间切换<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WindowActivate>事件发生，但<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ActivateEvent>工作簿的事件不会发生。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when you create a new window.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新窗口时，此事件不会发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ActivateEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ActivateEvent>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays worksheet `Sheet1` when the workbook is activated.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序会显示工作表`Sheet1`时激活该工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> object that represents the active chart (either an embedded chart or a chart sheet).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> 对象，该对象表示活动图表（嵌入图表或图表工作表）。

trans-unit.source: An embedded chart is considered active when it is either selected or activated.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入图表在选择或激活后被视为活动的。

trans-unit.source: When no chart is active, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果无活动图表，则此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> object that represents the active chart; <see langword="null" /> if no chart is active.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> 对象，表示活动图表；如果无活动图表，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ActiveChart%2A> property to get the active chart for the current workbook and then makes the title of the chart invisible.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ActiveChart%2A>属性来获取当前工作簿活动的图表，并将不可见的图表的标题。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the active sheet (the sheet on top).
trans-unit.target: 获取活动工作表（最上层的工作表）。

trans-unit.source: The active sheet (the sheet on top); <see langword="null" /> if no sheet is active.
trans-unit.target: 活动工作表（最上层的工作表）；如果无活动工作表，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook appears in more than one window, this property may be different in different windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿将显示在多个窗口中，此属性可能在不同的窗口中不同。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ActiveSheet%2A> property to display the name of the active worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ActiveSheet%2A>属性来显示活动工作表的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the active slicer in the active workbook or in the specified workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示活动工作簿或指定工作簿中的活动切片器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Slicer" /> that represents the active slicer in the active workbook or in the specified workbook.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Slicer" />，表示活动工作簿或指定工作簿中的活动切片器。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a Workbook object, this property returns the active slicer in the active workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定工作簿对象，此属性将返回 active 切片器中活动工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此属性将出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workbook is installed as an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 在工作簿作为外接程序安装时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AddinInstall> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AddinInstall>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler maximizes Microsoft Office Excel when the workbook is installed as an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿作为外接程序安装时，事件处理程序最大化 Microsoft Office Excel。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workbook is uninstalled as an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 在工作簿作为外接程序卸载时发生。

trans-unit.source: The add-in does not automatically close when it is uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 外接程序不会自动关闭时卸载。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AddinUninstall> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AddinUninstall>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler minimizes Microsoft Office Excel when the workbook is uninstalled as an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 当作为外接程序中卸载该工作簿时，事件处理程序将 Microsoft Office Excel 降至最低。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Adds a shortcut to the workbook to the Favorites folder.
trans-unit.target: 将工作簿的快捷方式添加到收藏夹文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the workbook is saved.
trans-unit.target: 在保存工作簿后发生。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after Microsoft Office Excel saves or exports data from the workbook to an XML data file.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Office Excel 保存工作簿的数据或将数据从工作簿导出到 XML 数据文件后发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to export XML data from a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从工作簿中导出 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The example imports the XML data from a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> into a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> in the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 此示例导入 XML 数据从<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>当前工作簿中。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A> method to export the data from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> into an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A>方法将数据从导出<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>到 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A> method is called, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlExport> event handler reports that the XML is being exported, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlExport> event handler reports whether the XML was successfully exported.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A>调用方法时，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlExport>事件处理程序会报告，正在导出的 XML，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlExport>事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导出 XML。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after an existing XML data connection is refreshed or after new XML data is imported into the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 在刷新现有 XML 数据连接后或将新 XML 数据导入工作簿后发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to import XML data into a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将 XML 数据导入工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> of customer names and adds an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> based on the XML schema for the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlMaps%2A> collection of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataSet>客户的名称，并将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>基于的 XML 架构<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlMaps%2A>当前工作簿的集合。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A> method to import the data into worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A>方法将数据导入到工作表`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A> method is called, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlImport> event handler prompts the user to either proceed with or cancel importing the XML, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlImport> event handler reports whether the XML was successfully imported.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A>调用方法时，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlImport>事件处理程序会提示用户继续还是取消导入 XML 中，与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlImport>事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导入了 XML。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the creator of the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示工作簿创建者的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the creator of the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示工作簿的创建者的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Application%2A> property to display the name of the application that created the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Application%2A>属性来显示当前工作簿创建的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The full file path of the theme to apply.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的主题的完整文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified theme to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 对工作簿应用指定的主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code example switches the workbook theme to the Foundry theme.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例会将工作簿主题切换到 Foundry 主题。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of minutes between automatic updates to the shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置自动更新共享工作簿的间隔分钟数。

trans-unit.source: The number of minutes between automatic updates to the shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 自动更新共享工作簿的间隔分钟数。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set to a value from 5 to 1440 for this property to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 5 到此属性才会生效的 1440年之间，此属性必须设置为一个值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether current changes to the shared workbook are posted to other users whenever the workbook is automatically updated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示每当工作簿自动更新时，是否将对共享工作簿所做的当前更改发送到其他用户。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if current changes to the shared workbook are posted to other users whenever the workbook is automatically updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果每当工作簿自动更新时，都将对共享工作簿所做的当前更改发送到其他用户，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if changes are not posted (this workbook is still synchronized with changes made by other users).
trans-unit.target: 如果不发送更改（此工作簿仍与其他用户所做更改保持同步），则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AutoUpdateFrequency%2A> property must be set to a value from 5 to 1440 for this property to take effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AutoUpdateFrequency%2A>从 5 到此属性才会生效 1440年情况下，属性必须设置为一个值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook" /> object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook" /> 对象扩展的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" /> 对象扩展的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase> class extends <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook> objects by implementing the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.IWorkbookExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>类扩展<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook>对象通过实现<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.IWorkbookExtension>接口。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the workbook closes.
trans-unit.target: 在关闭工作簿前发生。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook has been changed, this event occurs before the user is asked to save changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿已更改，则此事件在要求用户保存更改前发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeClose> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeClose>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler prompts the user to either save changes, not save changes, or cancel the close operation if changes have been made to the workbook since it was last saved.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序会提示用户进行保存更改，不保存更改，或取消关闭操作，如果自上次保存后对工作簿进行更改。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not save changes, then the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Saved%2A> property of the workbook is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not prompt the user to save the workbook when the close operation continues.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户不保存更改，则<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Saved%2A>工作簿的属性设置为`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不会提示用户保存工作簿时，继续执行关闭操作。

trans-unit.source: If the user cancels the close operation, then the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_BeforeCloseEventHandler> event handler is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not close the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户取消关闭操作，则`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_BeforeCloseEventHandler>事件处理程序设置为`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不会关闭工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the workbook (or anything in it) is printed.
trans-unit.target: 在打印工作簿（或其中任何内容）前发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforePrint> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforePrint>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler prompts the user to either continue with the print operation or cancel it.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序将提示用户继续打印操作或取消它。

trans-unit.source: If the user cancels the print operation, then the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_BeforePrintEventHandler> event handler is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not print the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户取消打印操作，则`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_BeforePrintEventHandler>事件处理程序设置为`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不打印工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the workbook is saved.
trans-unit.target: 在保存工作簿前发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeSave> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeSave>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler prompts the user to either continue with the save operation or cancel it.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序将提示用户继续使用该存储操作或取消它。

trans-unit.source: If the user cancels the save operation, then the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_BeforeSaveEventHandler> event handler is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not save the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户取消保存操作，则`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_BeforeSaveEventHandler>事件处理程序设置为`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不保存该工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before Microsoft Office Excel saves or exports data from the workbook to an XML data file.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Office Excel 保存工作簿的数据或将数据从工作簿导出到 XML 数据文件前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event will not occur when you are saving to the XML Spreadsheet file format.
trans-unit.target: 保存为 XML 电子表格文件格式时，将不会发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to export XML data from a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从工作簿中导出 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The example imports the XML data from a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> into a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> in the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 此示例导入 XML 数据从<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>当前工作簿中。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A> method to export the data from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> into an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A>方法将数据从导出<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>到 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A> method is called, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlExport> event handler reports that the XML is being exported, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlExport> event handler reports whether the XML was successfully exported.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A>调用方法时，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlExport>事件处理程序会报告，正在导出的 XML，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlExport>事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导出 XML。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an existing XML data connection is refreshed or before new XML data is imported into the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 在刷新现有 XML 数据连接前或将新 XML 数据导入工作簿前发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to import XML data into a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将 XML 数据导入工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> of customer names and adds an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> based on the XML schema for the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlMaps%2A> collection of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataSet>客户的名称，并将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>基于的 XML 架构<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlMaps%2A>当前工作簿的集合。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A> method to import the data into worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A>方法将数据导入到工作表`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A> method is called, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlImport> event handler prompts the user to either proceed with or cancel importing the XML, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlImport> event handler reports whether the XML was successfully imported.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A>调用方法时，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlImport>事件处理程序会提示用户继续还是取消导入 XML 中，与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlImport>事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导入了 XML。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The name of the link.
trans-unit.target: 链接的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The type of link.
trans-unit.target: 链接的类型。

trans-unit.source: Converts formulas linked to other Microsoft Office Excel sources or OLE sources to values.
trans-unit.target: 将链接到其他 Microsoft Office Excel 源或 OLE 源的公式转换为值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a link to another Excel workbook and then prompts the user to replace the link with the value of the link destination by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BreakLink%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建与另一个 Excel 工作簿的链接，然后提示用户使用该链接将链接目标的值替换<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BreakLink%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that workbook Book2.xlsx exists at the root of the C directory.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定该工作簿 Book2.xlsx 位于 C 目录的根目录。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties</c> collection that represents all the built-in document properties for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties</c> 集合，该集合表示工作簿的所有内置文档属性。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties</c> collection that represents all the built-in document properties for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: A<c>形式</c>表示工作簿的所有内置文档属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the entire collection of built-in document properties.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回整个集合的内置文档属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)` property to return a single member of the collection (a `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties` object) by specifying either the name of the property or the collection index (as a number).
trans-unit.target: 使用`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)`属性以返回集合的单个成员 (`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties`对象) 通过指定名称的属性或集合索引 （以数字）。

trans-unit.source: You can refer to document properties either by index value or by name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以参考文档属性，按索引值或名称。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the available built-in document property names:
trans-unit.target: 以下列表显示可用的内置文档属性名称：

trans-unit.source: Title
trans-unit.target: 标题

trans-unit.source: Subject
trans-unit.target: Subject

trans-unit.source: Author
trans-unit.target: 作者

trans-unit.source: Keywords
trans-unit.target: 关键字

trans-unit.source: Comments
trans-unit.target: 注释

trans-unit.source: Template
trans-unit.target: 模板

trans-unit.source: Last Author
trans-unit.target: 最后一个作者

trans-unit.source: Revision Number
trans-unit.target: 修订号

trans-unit.source: Application Name
trans-unit.target: Application Name

trans-unit.source: Last Print Date
trans-unit.target: 上一次打印日期

trans-unit.source: Creation Date
trans-unit.target: 创建日期

trans-unit.source: Last Save Time
trans-unit.target: 上次保存时间

trans-unit.source: Total Editing Time
trans-unit.target: 编辑时间总计

trans-unit.source: Number of Pages
trans-unit.target: 页面数

trans-unit.source: Number of Words
trans-unit.target: 字的数目

trans-unit.source: Number of Characters
trans-unit.target: 字符数

trans-unit.source: Security
trans-unit.target: 安全性

trans-unit.source: Category
trans-unit.target: 类别

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Manager
trans-unit.target: Manager

trans-unit.source: Company
trans-unit.target: 公司

trans-unit.source: Number of Bytes
trans-unit.target: 字节数

trans-unit.source: Number of Lines
trans-unit.target: 行数

trans-unit.source: Number of Paragraphs
trans-unit.target: 段落数

trans-unit.source: Number of Slides
trans-unit.target: 幻灯片数

trans-unit.source: Number of Notes
trans-unit.target: 说明的数

trans-unit.source: Number of Hidden Slides
trans-unit.target: 隐藏幻灯片数

trans-unit.source: Number of Multimedia Clips
trans-unit.target: 多媒体剪辑数

trans-unit.source: Hyperlink Base
trans-unit.target: 超链接基础

trans-unit.source: Number of Characters (with spaces)
trans-unit.target: （带空格） 的字符数

trans-unit.source: Container applications are not required to define values for every built-in document property.
trans-unit.target: 容器应用程序不需要定义每个内置文档属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If Microsoft Office Excel does not define a value for one of the built-in document properties, reading the `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Value` property for that document property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Excel 未定义的一个内置文档属性的值，读取`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Value`该文档属性的属性将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CustomDocumentProperties%2A> property to return the collection of custom document properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CustomDocumentProperties%2A>属性返回的自定义文档属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BuiltinDocumentProperties%2A> property to display all of the built-in document properties of the current workbook in column A of worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BuiltinDocumentProperties%2A>属性列 A 中工作表中显示的所有内置文档属性的当前工作簿`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a number that indicates the version of Excel that the workbook was last fully recalculated by.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数字，该数字指示上次对工作簿进行完全重新计算的 Excel 的版本。

trans-unit.source: The rightmost four digits are the minor calculation engine version number, and the other digits (on the left) are the major version of Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 最右边四位是计算引擎的次版本号，其他位（左边）是 Microsoft Office Excel 的主版本。

trans-unit.source: A number that indicates the version of Excel that the workbook was last fully recalculated by.
trans-unit.target: 一个数字，该数字指示上次对工作簿进行完全重新计算的 Excel 的版本。

trans-unit.source: The rightmost four digits are the minor calculation engine version number, and the other digits (on the left) are the major version of Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 最右边四位是计算引擎的次版本号，其他位（左边）是 Microsoft Office Excel 的主版本。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook was saved in an earlier version of Excel and if the workbook has not been fully recalculated, then this property returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿已保存的 Excel 和如果工作簿具有尚未完全重新计算的早期版本中，此属性将返回 0。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CalculationVersion%2A> property to display the version of Excel in which the workbook was last fully recalculated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CalculationVersion%2A>属性显示在其中工作簿上次进行完全重新计算的 Excel 的版本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Excel can check in the workbook to a server.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Excel 是否可以将工作簿签入到服务器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Excel can check in the workbook to a server; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Excel 可以将工作簿签入到服务器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CanCheckIn%2A> method to determine whether Microsoft Office Excel can check in the current workbook to a server.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CanCheckIn%2A>方法来确定是否 Microsoft Office Excel 可以签入到服务器的当前工作簿。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook can be checked in, then the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CheckIn%2A> method to save revisions and check in the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿可以签入，则该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CheckIn%2A>方法可保存修订版本并签入当前工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileAccess" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new access mode.
trans-unit.target: 指定新的访问模式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the write-reserved password if the file is write reserved and <c>Mode</c> is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileAccess.xlReadWrite" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件受写保护且 <c>Mode</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileAccess.xlReadWrite" />，则指定写保护密码。

trans-unit.source: Ignored if there is no password for the file or if <c>Mode</c> is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileAccess.xlReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有文件密码或 <c>Mode</c> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileAccess.xlReadOnly" />，则忽略。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to notify the user if the file cannot be immediately accessed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在无法直接访问文件时通知用户。

trans-unit.source: Changes the access permissions for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 更改工作簿的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This might require an updated version to be loaded from the disk.
trans-unit.target: 这可能需要从磁盘加载更新版本。

trans-unit.source: If you have a file open in read-only mode, you do not have exclusive access to the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有在只读模式下打开的文件，你不具有对该文件的独占访问权。

trans-unit.source: If you change a file from read-only to read/write, Microsoft Office Excel must load a new copy of the file to ensure that no changes were made while you had the file open as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果在将文件从只读的为读/写，Microsoft Office Excel 必须加载以确保该文件的新副本更改当你具有以只读方式打开的文件时未不进行任何更改。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnlyRecommended%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnly%2A> property is `false`, and then prompts the user to set the file access to read-only by calling the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ChangeFileAccess%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息，如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnlyRecommended%2A>属性是`true`和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnly%2A>属性是`false`，然后会提示用户设置的文件访问权限为只读的通过调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ChangeFileAccess%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of days shown in the shared workbook's change history.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在共享工作簿的更改历史记录中显示的天数。

trans-unit.source: The number of days shown in the shared workbook's change history.
trans-unit.target: 在共享工作簿的更改历史记录中显示的天数。

trans-unit.source: Any changes in the change history older than the setting for this property are removed when the workbook is closed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭工作簿时，将删除早于设置此属性的更改历史记录中的任何更改。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Microsoft Office Excel or DDE/OLE link to be changed, as it was returned from the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 要更改的 Microsoft Office Excel 或 DDE/OLE 链接的名称（和从 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources(System.Object)" /> 方法返回的一样）。

trans-unit.source: The new name of the link.
trans-unit.target: 链接的新名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkType" /> values that specifies the link type.
trans-unit.target: 指定链接类型的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Changes a link from one document to another.
trans-unit.target: 将链接从一个文档更改为另一个文档。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an external link to an Excel workbook and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ChangeLink%2A> method to change the link destination.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Excel 工作簿的外部链接，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ChangeLink%2A>方法可以更改链接目标。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that workbooks Book2.xlsx and Book3.xls exist at the root of the C directory.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定工作簿 Book2.xlsx 和 Book3.xls 存在在 C 目录的根目录。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the chart sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿中的所有图表工作表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the chart sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，表示工作簿中的所有图表工作表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Charts%2A> property to generate a print preview of all the chart sheets in the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Charts%2A>属性在当前工作簿中生成的所有图表工作表打印预览。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to run the compatibility checker automatically when the workbook is saved.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在保存工作簿时是否自动运行兼容性检查器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the compatibility checker should be run automatically when the workbook is saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在保存工作簿时应该自动运行兼容性检查器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default for Excel 97-2003 Binary (BIFF8) workbooks is <see langword="true" />; the default for all other workbooks is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于 Excel 97-2003 Binary (BIFF8) 工作簿，默认值为 <see langword="true" />；对于所有其他工作簿，默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> saves changes and checks in the document; <see langword="false" /> returns the document to a checked-in status without saving revisions.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则保存更改并签入文档；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则将文档返回到签入状态而不保存修订。

trans-unit.source: Allows the user to enter check-in comments for the revision of the workbook being checked in (applies only if <c>SaveChanges</c> equals <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: 允许用户为签入的工作簿的修订输入签入批注（仅当 <c>SaveChanges</c> 等于 <see langword="true" /> 时应用）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> allows the user to publish the workbook after it has been checked in.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在工作簿签入后发布该工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This submits the workbook for the approval process, which can eventually result in a version of the workbook being published to users with read-only rights to the workbook (applies only if <c>SaveChanges</c> equals <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: 这会提交工作簿供审批，审批过程最终会生成将发布给具有工作簿只读权限的用户的工作簿版本（仅当 <c>SaveChanges</c> 为 <see langword="true" /> 时才会如此）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a workbook from a local computer to a server, and sets the local workbook to read-only so that it cannot be edited locally.
trans-unit.target: 将本地计算机的工作簿返回到服务器，并将本地工作簿设置为只读，以使它不能进行本地编辑。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method closes the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法会关闭工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CanCheckIn%2A> method to determine whether Microsoft Office Excel can check in the current workbook to a server.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CanCheckIn%2A>方法来确定是否 Microsoft Office Excel 可以签入到服务器的当前工作簿。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook can be checked in, then the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CheckIn%2A> method to save revisions and check in the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿可以签入，则该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CheckIn%2A>方法可保存修订版本并签入当前工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to save changes and check in the document; <see langword="false" /> to return the document to a checked-in state without saving revisions.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则保存更改并签入文档；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则使文档恢复签入状态而不保存修订。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable check-in comments; false to check in the workbook without comments.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则启用签入注释；如果为 false，则在签入工作簿时丢弃注释。

trans-unit.source: This parameter applies only if <c>SaveChanges</c> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此参数仅当 <c>SaveChanges</c> 为 <see langword="true" /> 时才应用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable the user to publish the workbook after it has been checked in.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在工作簿签入后发布该工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This submits the workbook for the approval process, which can eventually result in a version of the workbook being published to users with read-only rights to the workbook (applies only if <c>SaveChanges</c> equals <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: 这会提交工作簿供审批，审批过程最终会生成将发布给具有工作簿只读权限的用户的工作簿版本（仅当 <c>SaveChanges</c> 为 <see langword="true" /> 时才会如此）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies versioning information for the document.
trans-unit.target: 指定文档的版本信息。

trans-unit.source: Sends the workbook from the local computer to a server, and sets the local workbook to read-only so that it cannot be edited locally.
trans-unit.target: 将本地计算机中的工作簿发送到服务器，并将本地工作簿设置为只读，以使它不能进行本地编辑。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method closes the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法会关闭工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CanCheckIn%2A> method to determine whether the document has been stored on a Microsoft Office SharePoint Portal Server.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CanCheckIn%2A>方法来确定该文档是否已存储在 Microsoft Office SharePoint Portal Server。

trans-unit.source: If the document has been stored on a server, the example calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CheckInWithVersion%2A> method to check in the document along with the specified comments and version number, save changes to the server location, and submit the document for the approval process.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在服务器上存储的文档，该示例将调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CheckInWithVersion%2A>方法来签入以及指定的注释和版本号，该文档将更改保存到的服务器位置，然后提交审批过程的文档。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: If there are no changes to the workbook, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有对工作簿进行更改，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: If there are changes to the workbook and the workbook appears in other open windows, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果对工作簿进行了更改且工作簿显示在其他打开的窗口中，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: If there are changes to the workbook but the workbook does not appear in any other open windows, this argument specifies whether changes should be saved, as shown in the following list.
trans-unit.target: 如果对工作簿进行了更改，但工作簿没有显示在任何其他打开的窗口中，则此参数指定更改是否应保存（如下面的列表所示）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 保存对工作簿所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: If there is not yet a file name associated with the workbook, then <c>FileName</c> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿还没有关联文件名，则使用 <c>FileName</c>。

trans-unit.source: If <c>FileName</c> is omitted, the user is asked to supply a file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略了 <c>FileName</c>，则要求用户提供文件名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Does not save the changes to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 不保存对工作簿所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: Omitted.
trans-unit.target: 省略。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box asking the user whether or not to save changes.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个对话框，询问用户是否保存更改。

trans-unit.source: Save changes under this file name.
trans-unit.target: 使用此文件名保存更改。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook does not need to be routed to the next recipient (if it has no routing slip or has already been routed), this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不需要传送给下一个收件人（如果该工作簿没有传送名单或已传送），则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, Microsoft Office Excel routes the workbook as shown in the following list.
trans-unit.target: 否则，Microsoft Office Excel 传送工作簿，如下面的列表所示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the workbook to the next recipient.
trans-unit.target: 将工作簿发送给下一个收件人。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Does not send the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 不发送工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Omitted.
trans-unit.target: 省略。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box asking the user whether the workbook should be sent.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个对话框，询问用户是否应发送工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Closes the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 关闭工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Closing a workbook using this method does not run any Auto_Close macros in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 关闭的工作簿，使用此方法不在工作簿中运行任何 Auto_Close 宏。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RunAutoMacros%2A> method to run the macros.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RunAutoMacros%2A>方法要运行这些宏。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Close%2A> method to close the current workbook without saving any changes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Close%2A>方法来关闭当前的工作簿而不保存任何更改。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets colors in the palette for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工作簿的调色板中的颜色。

trans-unit.source: An RGB color value in the color palette for the workbook, or an array that contains all 56 RGB color values in the color palette for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿的调色板中的一个 RGB 颜色值，或一个包含工作簿调色板中所有 56 个 RGB 颜色值的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Colors%2A> property can be used with the following parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Colors%2A>属性可使用以下参数。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The index number of a color in the workbook color palette (from 1 to 56).
trans-unit.target: 索引数 （从 1 至 56) 工作簿调色板中的颜色。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is not specified, this property returns an array that contains all 56 of the colors in the palette.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此参数，此属性将返回包含所有 56 种颜色调色板中的数组。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Colors%2A> without specifying any parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Colors%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook_ColorsType> object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Colors%2A>而不指定任何参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Colors%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook_ColorsType>对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The workbook palette has 56 entries, each represented by an RGB value.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿调色板中的 56 条目，每个表示 RGB 值。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Colors%2A> property to set the first color in the workbook's color palette to blue, and then programmatically displays the Microsoft Office Excel **Color Palette** dialog to verify that this change was made.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Colors%2A>属性可以在工作簿的调色板为蓝色，请设置的第一个颜色，然后以编程方式显示 Microsoft Office Excel**调色板**对话框来验证是否此进行更改。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBars</c> object that represents the Microsoft Office Excel command bars.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBars</c> 对象，该对象表示 Microsoft Office Excel 命令栏。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBars</c> object that represents the Microsoft Office Excel command bars.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBars</c>表示 Microsoft Office Excel 命令栏的对象。

trans-unit.source: When a workbook is embedded in another application and activated by the user by double-clicking the workbook, using the property with a Workbook object returns the set of Excel command bars available within the other application.
trans-unit.target: 当工作簿是嵌入其他应用程序中并由用户激活通过双击该工作簿时，使用通过工作簿对象的属性返回的一套 Excel 命令栏中其他应用程序可用。

trans-unit.source: At all other times, using this property with a Workbook object returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，使用此属性的工作簿对象返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: There is no programmatic way to return the set of command bars attached to a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 没有返回附加到工作簿的命令栏组无法通过编程方式。

trans-unit.source: Command bars are associated with the application and not the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 命令条是与应用程序和不是工作簿相关联。

trans-unit.source: This property exists on the workbook so you can access Excel application command bars when Excel is not the application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性存在于工作簿上，因此 Excel 不为应用程序时，你可以访问 Excel 应用程序命令栏。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CommandBars%2A> property to delete all custom command bars that are not visible.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CommandBars%2A>属性以删除所有不可见的自定义命令栏。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current workbook is embedded in another application.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定，当前工作簿嵌入在另一个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the way conflicts are to be resolved whenever a shared workbook is updated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置每次更新共享工作簿时解决冲突的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSaveConflictResolution" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSaveConflictResolution" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of connections between the workbook and a data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿和数据源之间的连接的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Connections</c> collection that contains the connections between the workbook and a data source.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Connections</c>集合，其中包含工作簿和数据源之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a new data connection to the specified CSV file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将新的数据连接添加到指定的 CSV 文件。

trans-unit.source: Next, the example iterates through all connections that exist in the workbook and displays the name, type, and description of each connection.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该示例循环访问工作簿中存在的所有连接，并显示名称、 类型和每个连接的说明。

trans-unit.source: This example requires a CSV file named SalesData.csv at the root of drive C. The CSV file should contain comma-separated data.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要名 SalesData.csv 为驱动器 c。 根处的 CSV 文件CSV 文件应包含以逗号分隔的数据。

trans-unit.source: When you run this example, Excel starts the **Text Import Wizard**; follow the steps in this wizard to create the data connection to the CSV file.
trans-unit.target: 运行此示例时，Excel 启动**文本导入向导**; 按照此向导创建数据连接到 CSV 文件中的步骤。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to disable the external connections or links in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否在工作簿中禁用外部连接或链接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to disable the external connections or links in the workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 指示在工作簿中禁用外部连接或链接；<see langword="false" /> 指示不禁用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the container application for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示工作簿的容器应用程序的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the container application for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 表示工作簿的容器应用程序的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property provides a way to access the object model of the container application if an Excel workbook is opened within a host application such as Microsoft Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您能够访问容器应用程序的对象模型，如果在宿主应用程序，如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 内打开的 Excel 工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of properties that describe metadata that is stored in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取描述工作簿中存储的元数据的属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MetaProperties</c> collection that contains properties that describe metadata that is stored in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MetaProperties</c>包含描述存储在工作簿的元数据属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the metadata that is associated with the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索与当前工作簿关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The example shows the total number of metadata properties found followed by the name and value of each property.
trans-unit.target: 在示例跟的名称和每个属性的值找到的元数据属性的总数。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, you must publish the workbook to a Microsoft Office SharePoint Server document library and provide a custom metadata property for this workbook.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，必须将工作簿发布到 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 文档库，并提供一个自定义元数据属性，此工作簿。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can add a column in the document library where the workbook is published.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以在其中发布该工作簿的文档库中添加列。

trans-unit.source: For more information about content type properties, please refer to the Microsoft Office SharePoint Server documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关内容的类型属性的详细信息，请参阅 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 文档。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a backup file is created when this file is saved.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示保存此文件时是否创建备份文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a backup file is created when this file is saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果保存此文件时创建备份文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回实现 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return an implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以返回的实现`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口。

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple Ribbons in your project, you can specify which Ribbons to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的项目中有多个功能区，你可以指定运行时在显示的功能区。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to override this method to return Ribbons that you add to the project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template.
trans-unit.target: 无需重写此方法以返回你使用添加到项目的功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项模板。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonManager> object that represents all **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items in the project.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此方法返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonManager>对象，表示所有**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项目中的项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: You must override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RequestService%2A> method to return Ribbons in your project that you add by using the **Ribbon (XML)** item template.
trans-unit.target: 必须重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RequestService%2A>方法以返回你使用添加的项目中的功能区**功能区 (XML)**项模板。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> method, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>方法，请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> objects to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 对象的数组返回给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the default implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase> class when the project contains **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用此方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>类在该项目包含**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定功能区显示在运行时，重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> method to specify which Ribbons to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以替代<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>方法，以指定运行时在显示的功能区。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application in which the workbook was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取在其中创建工作簿的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: If the object was created in Microsoft Office Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 Microsoft Office Excel 中创建对象时，此属性返回的字符串接，这等同于十六进制数字 5843454c。

trans-unit.source: This property is designed to be used in Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于在 Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符创建者代码。

trans-unit.source: For example, Excel has the creator code XCEL.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Excel 具有接的创建者代码。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Creator%2A> property to display whether the current workbook was created in Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Creator%2A>属性来显示是否在 Microsoft Office Excel 中创建当前工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties</c> collection that represents all the custom document properties for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties</c> 集合，该集合表示工作簿的所有自定义文档属性。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties</c> collection that represents all the custom document properties for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: A<c>形式</c>表示工作簿的所有自定义文档属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the entire collection of custom document properties.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回整个集合的自定义文档属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)` property to return a single member of the collection (a `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties` object) by specifying either the name of the property or the collection index (as a number).
trans-unit.target: 使用`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)`属性以返回集合的单个成员 (`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties`对象) 通过指定名称的属性或集合索引 （以数字）。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BuiltinDocumentProperties%2A> property to return the collection of built-in document properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BuiltinDocumentProperties%2A>属性返回的内置文档属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CustomDocumentProperties%2A> property to display all of the custom document properties for the current workbook in column A of worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CustomDocumentProperties%2A>属性，以显示当前工作簿的自定义文档属性的所有列 A 中工作表`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.CustomViews" /> collection that represents all the custom views for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.CustomViews" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿的所有自定义视图。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.CustomViews" /> collection that represents all the custom views for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.CustomViews" /> 集合，表示工作簿的所有自定义视图。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CustomViews%2A> property to add a custom view named "Summary" to the current workbook, and then programmatically displays the **Custom Views** dialog to demonstrate that the new custom view was created.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CustomViews%2A>要添加的自定义视图属性与当前的工作簿，名为"摘要"中，然后以编程方式显示**自定义视图**对话框，以说明新的自定义视图的创建.

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of custom XML parts in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿中的自定义 XML 部件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLParts</c> collection that contains the custom XML parts in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLParts</c>工作簿中的集合，包含自定义 XML 部件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom XML parts, see [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义 XML 部件的详细信息，请参阅[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds employee data to the document by inserting a new `Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart` in the `Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLParts` collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中将员工数据添加到文档的方法是插入一个新`Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart`中`Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLParts`集合。

trans-unit.source: The example then retrieves employee data from the XML part and displays the employee name and hire date on `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 示例然后从 XML 部件中检索员工数据，并显示雇员姓名和雇佣日期上`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workbook uses the 1904 date system.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作簿是否使用 1904 日期系统。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook uses the 1904 date system; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿使用 1904 日期系统，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workbook is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 在停用工作簿时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Deactivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Deactivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler tiles all open Microsoft Office Excel windows when the workbook is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序磁贴停用该工作簿的所有打开的 Microsoft Office Excel 窗口。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the table style from the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles" /> property that is used as the default style for PivotTable reports in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles" /> 属性中的表样式，该样式用作工作簿中的数据透视表的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: The table style from the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles" /> property that is used as the default style for PivotTable reports in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles" /> 属性中的表样式，该样式用作工作簿中的数据透视表的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default style of pivot tables to **Pivot Style Medium 3**, which is a style that is available in Excel on the **Design** tab in the **PivotTable Styles** group when a pivot table is selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置到的数据透视表的默认样式**数据透视表样式中等 3**，即会出现在 Excel 上样式**设计**选项卡中**数据透视表样式**组选中数据透视表。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the table style from the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles" /> property that is used as the default style for tables in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles" /> 属性中的表样式，该样式用作工作簿中的表的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: The table style from the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles" /> property that is used as the default style for tables in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles" /> 属性中的表样式，该样式用作工作簿中的表的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default style of tables to **Table Style Dark 11**, which is a style that is available in Excel on the **Design** tab in the **Table Styles** group when a table is selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置到的表的默认样式**表样式深色 11**，即会出现在 Excel 上样式**设计**选项卡中**表样式**当选择某个表的组。

trans-unit.source: The example then adds a table to verify the new table style.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例添加一个表以验证新的表格样式。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Names the number format to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 指定要删除的数字格式。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a custom number format from the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 从工作簿中删除自定义数字格式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.DeleteNumberFormat%2A> method to delete the custom number format "#.###,##" from the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.DeleteNumberFormat%2A>方法来删除自定义数字格式"#.# # #，# #"从当前工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how shapes are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置形状的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDisplayDrawingObjects" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDisplayDrawingObjects.xlDisplayShapes" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDisplayDrawingObjects.xlPlaceholders" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDisplayDrawingObjects.xlHide" />.
trans-unit.target: 以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDisplayDrawingObjects" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDisplayDrawingObjects.xlDisplayShapes" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDisplayDrawingObjects.xlPlaceholders" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDisplayDrawingObjects.xlHide" />。
