trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a doughnut shape to worksheet `Sheet1` of the current workbook, and then prompts the user to hide drawing objects by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.DisplayDrawingObjects%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将圆环图形状添加到工作表`Sheet1`当前工作簿，然后提示用户隐藏绘制对象使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.DisplayDrawingObjects%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the user hides drawing objects, then the doughnut shape will be invisible; otherwise, the doughnut shape will be visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户将会隐藏绘制对象，则圆环图形状将不可见;否则，圆环图形状将可见。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether ink comments are displayed in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作簿中是否显示墨迹注释。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if ink comments are displayed in the workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿中显示墨迹批注，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" /> 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Dispose%2A> method yourself.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Dispose%2A>方法自己。

trans-unit.source: When the document in a document-level customization is closed, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] cleans up all resources used by the customization.
trans-unit.target: 当关闭的文档级自定义项中的文档时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]清理使用自定义项的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Dispose%2A> method, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Dispose%2A>方法，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of Document Inspector modules for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿的文档检查器模块的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors</c> collection that contains the Document Inspector modules for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors</c>集合，其中包含工作簿的文档检查器模块。

trans-unit.source: The following code example iterates through the inspectors in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例循环访问工作簿中的检查器。

trans-unit.source: The code inspects each one and shows a message box that displays the name of the inspector, and the status and results of the inspection.
trans-unit.target: 该代码将检查每个，并显示一个消息框，其中显示该检查器的状态和检查结果的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions</c> collection that represents the collection of versions of a shared workbook that has versioning enabled and that is stored in a document library on a server.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions</c> 集合，该集合表示共享工作簿（启用了版本控制并存储在服务器上的文档库中）的版本集合。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions</c> collection that represents the collection of versions of a shared workbook that has versioning enabled and that is stored in a document library on a server.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions</c>表示共享工作簿，其启用版本控制和存储在文档库中的服务器上的版本的集合的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to prompt the user to convert the workbook if it contains features that are not supported by versions of Excel earlier than Excel 2007.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在工作簿包含 Excel 2007 之前的 Excel 版本不支持的功能的情况下，是否提示用户转换工作簿。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to prompt the user to convert the workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示提示用户转换工作簿；<see langword="false" /> 表示不提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Excel saves changed files, of all formats, on a timed interval.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Excel 是否按时间间隔保存更改后的文件（所有格式）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Excel saves changed files on a timed interval; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Excel 按时间间隔保存更改后的文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If Excel fails, the system fails, or if the system is improperly shut down (not allowing Excel to save the changed files), the backed up files are opened and the user has an opportunity to save changes that otherwise would have been lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Excel 失败，系统会出现故障，或如果系统不正确关闭的情况下 （不允许 Excel 不能保存更改的文件），打开备份的文件，并且用户有机会保存更改，否则可能已丢失。

trans-unit.source: When the user restarts Excel, a document recovery window opens, giving the user an option to recover the files they were working on.
trans-unit.target: 当用户重启 Excel 时，将打开文档恢复窗口，向用户提供恢复他们正在处理的文件的选项。

trans-unit.source: Enables data connections within the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 启用工作簿内的数据连接。

trans-unit.source: The following code example calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.EnableConnections%2A> method to enable data connections in the workbook and suppress any security warnings for existing data connections.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.EnableConnections%2A>方法启用工作簿中的数据连接，并禁止显示现有的数据连接的任何安全警告。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the algorithm encryption provider that Microsoft Office Excel uses when encrypting passwords for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Microsoft Office Excel 用来加密工作簿密码的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the algorithm encryption provider that Excel uses when encrypting passwords for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: Excel 用来加密工作簿密码的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A> property to determine whether the workbook is password protected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A>属性来确定工作簿是否受密码保护。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A> property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受密码保护，然后该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A>的密码的属性获取用户输入，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法来设置加密算法、 设置的密钥长度、 设定的加密提供程序的名称并启用文件属性加密。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A> properties in worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例显示的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A>工作表中的属性`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method `GetPasswordFromUserInput` is defined elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定方法`GetPasswordFromUserInput`其他位置定义。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Terminates a review of a file that has been sent for review using the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendForReview(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendForReview(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)" /> 方法终止对发送审阅的文件的审阅。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the e-mail composition header and the envelope toolbar are both visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示电子邮件撰写标题和信封工具栏是否都可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the e-mail composition header and the envelope toolbar are both visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果电子邮件撰写标题和信封工具栏都可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 international macro sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿中的所有 Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 国际宏表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 international macro sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，表示工作簿中的所有 Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 国际宏表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example iterates through every <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName> returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Excel4IntlMacroSheets%2A> property and writes the code name of each worksheet to the debug output.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例循环访问每个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Excel4IntlMacroSheets%2A>属性，并写入输出发送到调试每个工作表的代码名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 macro sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿中的所有 Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 宏表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 macro sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，表示工作簿中的所有 Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 宏表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example iterates through every <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName> returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Excel4MacroSheets%2A> property and writes the code name of each worksheet to the debug output.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例循环访问每个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Worksheet?displayProperty=fullName>返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Excel4MacroSheets%2A>属性，并写入输出发送到调试每个工作表的代码名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workbook is in compatibility mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作簿是否处于兼容模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook is in compatibility mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿处于兼容模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In compatibility mode, certain functionality is disabled or functions differently.
trans-unit.target: 在兼容性模式下，某些功能被禁用或函数以不同的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, Excel 2007 workbooks in compatibility mode are restricted to the same number of rows and columns that are available in earlier versions of Excel.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在兼容模式下的 Excel 2007 工作簿被限制为相同数量的行和列的早期版本的 Excel 中可用。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the current user exclusive access to the workbook that is open as a shared list.
trans-unit.target: 向当前用户分配作为共享列表打开的工作簿的独占访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This method saves any changes made to the workbook and requires other users who have the workbook open to save their changes to a different file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将保存到的工作簿所做的任何更改，并要求该工作簿的其他用户打开以将其更改保存到不同的文件。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not open as a shared list, this method fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿未打开作为共享列表，此方法将失败。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a workbook is open as a shared list, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.MultiUserEditing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否已为共享的列表打开工作簿，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.MultiUserEditing%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> values that specifies whether to save the workbook in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> 值，该值指定是否要将工作簿保存为 PDF 或 XPS 格式。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the new PDF or XPS file.
trans-unit.target: 新 PDF 或 XPS 文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，Excel 会将文件保存在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> values that specifies the quality of the exported file.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> 值，该值指定导出文件的质量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include document properties in the exported file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在导出的文件中包含文档属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore any print areas set when exporting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在导出时忽略任何打印区域设置，请使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start exporting.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始导出的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted, exporting starts at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则从第一页开始导出。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to export.
trans-unit.target: 要导出的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted, exporting ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则导出完最后一页后停止导出。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to open the new file after exporting the workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在导出工作簿后打开新文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an implementation of the <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> interface that enables the workbook to be saved in a different fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指向 <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> 接口的实现的指针，可使工作簿保存为另一种固定格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能”。

trans-unit.source: Saves a workbook in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: 以 PDF 或 XPS 格式保存工作簿。

trans-unit.source: You can save as a PDF or XPS file from Microsoft Office Excel only after you install an add-in that provides this feature.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将保存为 PDF 或 XPS 文件从 Microsoft Office Excel 仅后提供此功能的外接程序安装。

trans-unit.source: For more information, search for "Enable support for other file formats, such as PDF and XPS" on Office Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，搜索"启用支持对其他文件格式，例如 PDF 和 XPS"Office online。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example saves the first page of the workbook in PDF format to the specified file path using high-quality resolution.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将保存在指定的文件路径使用高质量解析到的 PDF 格式的工作簿的第一页。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file format and type of the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿的文件格式和类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileFormat" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FileFormat%2A> property to determine whether the workbook is a normal workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FileFormat%2A>属性来确定工作簿是否正常工作簿。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is a normal workbook, then the example calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet.SaveAs%2A> method to resave the workbook as an XML spreadsheet with the name `XMLCopy.xlsx` in the path specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿是否正常工作簿，然后该示例调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet.SaveAs%2A>方法来重新工作簿保存为 XML 电子表格同名`XMLCopy.xlsx`中指定的路径<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Path%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workbook is final.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作簿是否处于最终状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook is final; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿处于最终状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property to `true`, recipients are notified that the workbook is final, and the workbook is set to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性为`true`，通知收件人的工作簿处于最终状态，并且该工作簿将设置为只读。

trans-unit.source: The address of the target document.
trans-unit.target: 目标文档的地址。

trans-unit.source: The location within the target document.
trans-unit.target: 目标文档中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the target application in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在新窗口中显示目标应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 留待将来使用。

trans-unit.source: A string or byte array that specifies additional information for HTTP to use to resolve the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串或字节数组，指定用于解析超链接的有关 HTTP 的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use <c>ExtraInfo</c> to specify the coordinates of an image map, the contents of a form, or a FAT file name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用 <c>ExtraInfo</c> 指定图像映射的坐标、窗体的内容或 FAT 文件名。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the way <c>ExtraInfo</c> is attached.
trans-unit.target: 指定附加 <c>ExtraInfo</c> 的方式。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod" /> constants: <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod.msoMethodGet" /> or <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod.msoMethodPost" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod" /> 常数之一：<see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod.msoMethodGet" /> 或 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod.msoMethodPost" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies header information for the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定 HTTP 请求的标头信息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Displays a cached document, if it has already been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档已下载，则显示缓存文档。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method resolves the hyperlink, downloads the target document, and displays the document in the appropriate application.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法解析超链接，下载目标文档并在适当的应用程序中显示此文档。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FollowHyperlink%2A> method to display the document at a specified address in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FollowHyperlink%2A>方法以在指定的地址，在新窗口中显示文档。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to force a full calculation of a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否强制对工作簿进行完全计算。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to force a full calculation of a workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果强制对工作簿进行完全计算，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the object, including its path on disk.
trans-unit.target: 获取对象的名称，包括其磁盘路径。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object, including its path on disk.
trans-unit.target: 对象的名称，包括其磁盘路径。

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Path%2A> property, followed by the current file system separator, followed by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等效于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Path%2A>属性，当前文件系统的分隔符后, 跟跟<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FullName%2A> property to display the full name of the workbook, including its path.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FullName%2A>属性来显示该工作簿，包括其路径的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the object, including its path on disk.
trans-unit.target: 获取对象的名称，包括其磁盘路径。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object, including its path on disk.
trans-unit.target: 对象的名称，包括其磁盘路径。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FullNameURLEncoded%2A> property to display the full name of the workbook, including its path, encoded as a URL.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FullNameURLEncoded%2A>属性来显示该工作簿，包括其路径、 作为 URL 编码的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Called by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] to get an object that can be used by VBA code in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 由 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 调用，用于获取可由工作簿中的 VBA 代码使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object in a document-level customization that can be used by VBA code in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 文档级自定义项中的一个对象，可由工作簿中的 VBA 代码使用。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return an instance of a class that you have exposed to VBA code in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以返回向工作簿中的 VBA 代码公开的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Calling Code in Document-Level Customizations from VBA](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/aa99527b-eb50-4ac9-9855-92b913e75906).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项从 VBA 中调用代码](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/aa99527b-eb50-4ac9-9855-92b913e75906)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of workflow tasks for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 返回工作簿的工作流任务的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.WorkflowTasks</c> collection that contains the workflow tasks for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.WorkflowTasks</c> 集合，包含工作簿的工作流任务。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the number of workflow tasks that are currently associated with the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示当前与该工作簿关联的工作流任务数。

trans-unit.source: The example then iterates through each workflow task, if any, and shows some selected task properties in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后循环访问每个工作流任务，如果有的话，并在消息框中显示所选的任务的一些属性。

trans-unit.source: To add workflow tasks to your workbook, you must publish the workbook to an Office Sharepoint Server site.
trans-unit.target: 若要将工作流任务添加到你的工作簿，必须将工作簿发布到 Office Sharepoint Server 站点。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of workflow templates for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 返回工作簿的工作流模板的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.WorkflowTemplates</c> collection that contains the workflow templates for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.WorkflowTemplates</c> 集合，包含工作簿的工作流模板。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the number of workflow templates that are available for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示可用于工作簿的工作流模板的数目。

trans-unit.source: If one or more workflow templates exist, the example displays the name and description of each template.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在一个或多个工作流模板，此示例将显示的名称和每个模板的说明。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must publish the workbook to an Office SharePoint Server site.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须将工作簿发布到 Office SharePoint Server 站点。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workbook has a protection password.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作簿是否具有保护密码。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook has a protection password; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿具有保护密码，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A> property to determine whether the workbook is password protected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A>属性来确定工作簿是否受密码保护。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A> property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受密码保护，然后该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A>的密码的属性获取用户输入，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法来设置加密算法、 设置的密钥长度、 设定的加密提供程序的名称并启用文件属性加密。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A> properties in worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例显示的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A>工作表中的属性`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the existence of a method named `GetPasswordFromUserInput` that obtains a strong password from user input.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定一个名为方法是否存在`GetPasswordFromUserInput`，从用户输入获取强密码。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a workbook has an attached Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) project.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作簿是否具有附加的 Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) 项目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook has an attached VBA project; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿具有附加的 VBA 项目，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether changes to the shared workbook are highlighted on screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在屏幕上突出显示对共享工作簿所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if changes to the shared workbook are highlighted on screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在屏幕上突出显示对共享工作簿所做的更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The changes that are shown.
trans-unit.target: 显示的更改。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime.xlSinceMyLastSave" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime.xlAllChanges" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime.xlNotYetReviewed" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime.xlSinceMyLastSave" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime.xlAllChanges" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime.xlNotYetReviewed" />。

trans-unit.source: The user or users whose changes are shown.
trans-unit.target: 显示其更改的用户。

trans-unit.source: Can be "Everyone", "Everyone but Me", or the name of one of the users of the shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 可以是“Everyone”、“Everyone but Me”或共享工作簿的用户名之一。

trans-unit.source: An A1-style range reference that specifies the area to check for changes.
trans-unit.target: 一个 A1 样式范围引用，指定要检查更改的区域。

trans-unit.source: Controls how changes are shown in a shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 控制在共享工作簿中显示更改的方式。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of built-in icon sets that can be used to apply a conditional formatting rule to a range in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取内置图标集的集合，这些图标集可用于对工作簿中的范围应用条件格式规则。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSets</c> collection that contains the built-in icon set objects that can be used to apply a conditional formatting rule to a range.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSets</c>包含内置的图标的收集组可应用到的区域的条件格式设置规则的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use an icon set to classify range data into three to five categories separated by threshold values.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用图标集以将范围数据划分到隔开阈值的三到五个类别。

trans-unit.source: Each icon represents a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 每个图标表示一系列的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows` icon set, the red up arrow represents higher values, the yellow sideways arrow represents middle values, and the green down arrow represents lower values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows`图标集，红色向上箭头代表较高值、 黄色侧向箭头代表中间值，和绿色向下箭头表示较低的值。

trans-unit.source: To apply a conditional formatting rule based on an icon set, create a new `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition` by using the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions.AddIconSetCondition` method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.FormatConditions%2A> property of a range, or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormatConditions%2A> property of a named range.
trans-unit.target: 若要应用基于图标集条件格式设置规则，创建一个新`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition`使用`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions.AddIconSetCondition`方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range.FormatConditions%2A>属性的范围，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.NamedRange.FormatConditions%2A>的命名范围的属性。

trans-unit.source: Then, set the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition.IconSet` property to an `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet` object that you retrieve from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.IconSets%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 然后，设置`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition.IconSet`属性`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet`从检索的对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.IconSets%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet` object that you want to retrieve, pass in one of the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet` enumeration values as an index to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.IconSets%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet`你想要检索，则之一传递的对象`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet`枚举值的索引<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.IconSets%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates a range on `Sheet1` with values from 1 to 6.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例在填充范围`Sheet1`的值为从 1 到 6。

trans-unit.source: The example then adds an icon set condition to the range A1:A6 with the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows` icon set.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例添加一个图标将条件设置为范围 a1: a6 与`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows`图标集。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether list borders are visible when a list is not active.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列表不活动时列表边框是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the border is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果边框可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook" /> that represents the underlying native object for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" /> 的基础本机对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook" /> that represents the underlying native object for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase" /> 的基础本机对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workbook is running as an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作簿是否作为外接程序运行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook is running as an add-in; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿作为外接程序运行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property to `true`, the workbook has the following characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性为`true`，该工作簿具有以下特征：

trans-unit.source: You are not prompted to save the workbook if changes are made while the workbook is open.
trans-unit.target: 你不会提示保存工作簿，如果工作簿处于打开状态时进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The workbook window is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿窗口不可见。

trans-unit.source: Any macros in the workbook are not visible in the **Macro** dialog box (displayed by pointing to **Macro** on the **Tools** menu and clicking **Macros**).
trans-unit.target: 工作簿中的所有宏都都不显示在**宏**对话框 (通过指向显示**宏**上**工具**菜单，然后单击**宏**).

trans-unit.source: Macros in the workbook can still be run from the **Macro** dialog box even though they are not visible.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿中的宏仍可运行从**宏**对话框中，即使它们是不可见。

trans-unit.source: In addition, macro names do not need to be qualified with the workbook name.
trans-unit.target: 此外，宏名称不必是与工作薄名称限定的。

trans-unit.source: Holding down the SHIFT key when you open the workbook has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 按住 SHIFT 键，当您打开工作簿时无任何影响。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified workbook is being edited in place
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示指定的工作簿是否正在就地编辑

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified workbook is being edited in place; <see langword="false" /> if the workbook has been opened in Microsoft Office Excel for editing.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的工作簿正在就地编辑，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果工作簿已在 Microsoft Office Excel 中打开进行编辑，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether change tracking is enabled for the shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示共享工作簿是否启用了更改跟踪。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if change tracking is enabled for the shared workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果共享工作簿启用了更改跟踪，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the link.
trans-unit.target: 链接的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkInfo" /> values that specifies the type of information to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkInfo" /> 值之一，指定要返回的信息的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkInfoType" /> values that specifies the type of link to return information for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkInfoType" /> 值之一，指定要为之返回信息的链接的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the link is an edition, this parameter specifies the edition reference as a string in R1C1 style.
trans-unit.target: 如果链接为版本，则此参数将版本引用指定为 R1C1 样式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <c>EditionRef</c> is required if there is more than one publisher or subscriber with the same name in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿中有多个同名的发布者或订阅者，则需要 <c>EditionRef</c>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the link date and update status.
trans-unit.target: 获取链接日期和更新状态。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates information about the link.
trans-unit.target: 指示关于链接的信息的值。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="LinkInfoArgument" /> is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkInfo.xlUpdateState" />, this method returns 1 if the link updates automatically, or 2 if the link must be updated manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="LinkInfoArgument" /> 为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkInfo.xlUpdateState" />，则此方法返回 1（如果链接自动更新）或 2（如果链接必须手动更新）。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses gets the collection of DDE/OLE links in the current workbook, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkInfo%2A> method to determine whether or not each DDE/OLE link updates automatically or manually.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用的获取 DDE/OLE 的集合中当前工作簿的链接，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkInfo%2A>方法以确定每个 DDE/OLE 链接是否更新自动或手动。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLink" /> values specifying the type of links to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLink" /> 值之一，指定要返回的链接的类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of links in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 返回工作簿中的链接的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of link names in the workbook; <see langword="null" /> if the workbook does not contain any links of the specified <paramref name="Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿中的链接名称的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />；如果工作簿不包含指定的 <paramref name="Type" /> 的任何链接，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The names in the returned <xref:System.Array> are the names of the linked documents, editions, or DDE or OLE servers.
trans-unit.target: 在返回的名称<xref:System.Array>是链接的文档、 版本，或 DDE 或 OLE 服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: The format of the array is a one-dimensional array for all types but publisher and subscriber.
trans-unit.target: 该数组的格式是一维数组的所有类型，但发布服务器和订阅服务器。

trans-unit.source: The returned strings contain the name of the link source, in the appropriate notation for the link type.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串包含的链接类型的相应表示法中的链接源的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, DDE links use the "Server|Document!Item" syntax.
trans-unit.target: 例如，DDE 链接使用"服务器 | 文档 ！项"语法。

trans-unit.source: For publisher and subscriber links, the returned array is two-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: 有关发布服务器和订阅服务器的链接，则返回的数组是二维。

trans-unit.source: The first column of the array contains the names of the edition, and the second column contains the references of the editions as text.
trans-unit.target: 数组的第一列包含的版本，名称和第二列包含的各个版本的引用为文本。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds an external Excel link to the current workbook and gets an array of the names of all Excel links in the workbook by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将外部 Excel 链接添加到当前工作簿和工作簿中获取的 Excel 的所有链接的名称的数组，通过使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.OpenLinks%2A> method to open each linked workbook as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.OpenLinks%2A>方法打开每个链接的工作簿为只读。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether changes to the shared workbook are shown on a separate worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对共享工作簿所做的更改是否显示在单独的工作表上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if changes to the shared workbook are shown on a separate worksheet; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对共享工作簿所做的更改显示在单独的工作表上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Locks the workbook on the server to prevent modification.
trans-unit.target: 锁定服务器上的工作簿以防止修改。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the workbook that contains the changes to be merged into the open workbook.
trans-unit.target: 包含要合并到打开的工作簿中的更改的工作簿的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Merges changes from one workbook into an open shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 将更改从一个工作簿合并到一个打开的共享工作簿中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workbook is open as a shared list.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作簿是否作为共享列表打开。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook is open as a shared list; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿作为共享列表打开，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio does not support shared workbooks.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 不支持共享工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Name%2A> property to display the name of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Name%2A>属性来显示当前工作簿的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Names" /> collection that represents all the names in the workbook (including all worksheet-specific names).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Names" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿中的所有名称（包括所有工作表特定的名称）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Names" /> collection that represents all the names in the workbook (including all worksheet-specific names).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Names" /> 集合，表示工作簿中的所有名称（包括所有工作表特定的名称）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Names%2A> property to create three <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name?displayProperty=fullName> objects that refer to different ranges on worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Names%2A>属性创建三个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name?displayProperty=fullName>引用工作表上的不同范围的对象`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: The example then iterates through every <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name?displayProperty=fullName> in the workbook and displays the names in column A of worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例循环访问每个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Name?displayProperty=fullName>中的工作簿和显示列 A 中工作表的名称`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new workbook is created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新工作簿时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.New> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.New>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler maximizes the Microsoft Office Excel application window when a new workbook is created.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序创建新的工作簿时 Microsoft Office Excel 应用程序窗口最大化。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new chart is created in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 在工作簿中创建新图表时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new sheet is created in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 在工作簿中创建新工作表时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.NewSheet> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.NewSheet>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler moves the new worksheet to the last position in the workbook when a new worksheet is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建新工作表时，事件处理程序将新工作表移动到工作簿中的最后一个位置。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new window.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新窗口。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.NewWindow%2A> method to create a new Excel application window that has the caption "This is a new window" and does not have gridlines.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.NewWindow%2A>方法来创建一个新的 Excel 应用程序窗口具有标题"这是一个新窗口"，但没有网格线。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workbook is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在打开工作簿时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Open> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Open>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler maximizes the Microsoft Office Excel application window when the current workbook is opened.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序打开当前工作簿时 Microsoft Office Excel 应用程序窗口最大化。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Microsoft Office Excel or DDE/OLE link, as returned from the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Excel 或 DDE/OLE 链接的名称（和从 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources(System.Object)" /> 方法返回的一样）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to open documents as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则以只读方式打开文档。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLink" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLink" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The link type.
trans-unit.target: 链接类型。

trans-unit.source: Opens the supporting documents for a link or links.
trans-unit.target: 打开一个或多个链接的支持文档。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources%2A> method to get an array of the names of all Excel links in the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources%2A>方法在当前工作簿中获取所有 Excel 链接的名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.OpenLinks%2A> method to open each document as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.OpenLinks%2A>方法打开每个文档为只读。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent object for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿的父对象。

trans-unit.source: The parent object for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿的父对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Parent%2A> property to display the name of the parent of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Parent%2A>属性来显示的父级的当前工作簿的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password that must be supplied to open the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置打开工作簿时必须提供的密码。

trans-unit.source: The password that must be supplied to open the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 打开工作簿时必须提供的密码。

trans-unit.source: Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
trans-unit.target: 使用强密码合并大写和小写字母、 数字和符号。

trans-unit.source: Weak passwords do not mix these elements.
trans-unit.target: 弱密码不同时包含这些元素。

trans-unit.source: Strong password: Y6dh!et5.
trans-unit.target: 强密码： Y6dh ！ et5。

trans-unit.source: Weak password: House27.
trans-unit.target: 弱密码： House27。

trans-unit.source: Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down.
trans-unit.target: 使用你自己可以记住，以便无需将其记下的强密码。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A> property to determine whether the workbook is password protected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A>属性来确定工作簿是否受密码保护。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A> property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受密码保护，然后该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A>的密码的属性获取用户输入，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法来设置加密算法、 设置的密钥长度、 设定的加密提供程序的名称并启用文件属性加密。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A> properties in worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例显示的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A>工作表中的属性`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method `GetPasswordFromUserInput` is defined elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定方法`GetPasswordFromUserInput`其他位置定义。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the algorithm that Microsoft Office Excel uses to encrypt passwords for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Microsoft Office Excel 用来加密工作簿密码的算法。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm that Excel uses to encrypt passwords for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: Excel 用来加密工作簿密码的算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to specify whether Excel encrypts file properties for password-protected workbooks.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法，以指定 Excel 是否对文件属性受密码保护的工作簿进行加密。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A> property to determine whether the workbook is password protected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A>属性来确定工作簿是否受密码保护。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A> property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受密码保护，然后该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A>的密码的属性获取用户输入，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法来设置加密算法、 设置的密钥长度、 设定的加密提供程序的名称并启用文件属性加密。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A> properties in worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例显示的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A>工作表中的属性`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method `GetPasswordFromUserInput` is defined elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定方法`GetPasswordFromUserInput`其他位置定义。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Excel encrypts file properties for the specified password-protected workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Excel 是否对受密码保护的指定工作簿的文件属性进行加密。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Excel encrypts file properties for the specified password-protected workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Excel 对受密码保护的指定工作簿的文件属性进行加密，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to specify whether Excel encrypts file properties for the specified password-protected workbook.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法，以指定 Excel 是否对文件属性中指定的受密码保护的工作簿进行加密。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A> property to determine whether the workbook is password protected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A>属性来确定工作簿是否受密码保护。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A> property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受密码保护，然后该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A>的密码的属性获取用户输入，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法来设置加密算法、 设置的密钥长度、 设定的加密提供程序的名称并启用文件属性加密。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A> properties in worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例显示的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A>工作表中的属性`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.target: 此示例假定方法`GetPasswordFromUserInput`其他位置定义。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列表的筛选器设置和排序设置是否包括在共享工作簿的用户个人视图中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if filter and sort settings for lists are included in the user's personal view of the shared workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表的筛选器设置和排序设置包括在共享工作簿的用户个人视图中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此参数忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Post(System.Object)" /> method prompts the user to specify the destination for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Post(System.Object)" /> 方法提示用户指定工作簿的目标。

trans-unit.source: Posts the workbook to a public folder.
trans-unit.target: 将工作簿发送到公共文件夹。

trans-unit.source: This method works only with a Microsoft Exchange client connected to a Microsoft Exchange server.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅用于连接到 Microsoft Exchange 服务器的 Microsoft Exchange 客户端。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether calculations in this workbook will be done using only the precision of the numbers as they are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否仅使用数字所显示的精度来完成工作簿中的计算。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if calculations in this workbook will be done using only the precision of the numbers as they are displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅使用数字所显示的精度来完成工作簿中的计算，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start printing.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始打印的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing starts at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则打印从第一页开始。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则打印至最后一页。

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的份数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, one copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此参数，则打印一份。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel invoke print preview before printing the object.
trans-unit.target: 若要在打印对象前让 Microsoft Office Excel 调用打印预览，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to print the object immediately.
trans-unit.target: 若要立即打印对象，请使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the active printer.
trans-unit.target: 设置活动打印机的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to print to a file.
trans-unit.target: 若要打印到文件，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrToFileName</c> is not specified, Excel prompts the user to enter the name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 若未指定 <c>PrToFileName</c>，则 Excel 会提示用户输入输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to collate multiple copies.
trans-unit.target: 若逐份打印多个副本，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrintToFile</c> is set to <see langword="true" />, this argument specifies the name of the file you want to print to.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>PrintToFile</c> 设为 <see langword="true" />，则此参数指定要打印到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore print areas and print the entire workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要忽略打印区域并打印整个工作簿，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Prints the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 打印工作簿。

trans-unit.source: "Pages" in the descriptions of `From` and `To` refers to printed pages, not to overall pages in the sheet or workbook.
trans-unit.target: "页"中的说明`From`和`To`指打印的页面，不适用于表或工作簿中的全部页。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PrintOutEx%2A> method to print two collated copies of the first two printed pages of the workbook to the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PrintOutEx%2A>方法打印到默认打印机工作簿的前两个打印页的两个已设置排序规则的副本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow changes to the margins and page setup while displaying the print preview; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则允许在显示打印预览时更改边距和页面设置；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Shows a preview of the object as it would look when printed.
trans-unit.target: 显示与打印效果相同的对象的预览。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PrintPreview%2A> method to show a print preview of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PrintPreview%2A>方法来显示当前工作簿的打印预览。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A case-sensitive password for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿的密码，区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, you can unprotect the workbook without using a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则无需使用密码即可取消保护工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must specify the password to unprotect the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 否则，必须指定密码才能取消保护工作簿。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect the structure of the workbook (the relative position of the sheets).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则保护工作簿的结构（工作表的相对位置）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to protect the workbook windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则保护工作簿窗口。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the windows are not protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则窗口不受保护。

trans-unit.source: Protects a workbook so that it cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 保护工作簿使其无法修改。

trans-unit.source: Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
trans-unit.target: 使用强密码合并大写和小写字母、 数字和符号。

trans-unit.source: Weak passwords do not mix these elements.
trans-unit.target: 弱密码不同时包含这些元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, "Y6dh!et5" is a strong password, but "House27" is a weak password.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"Y6dh ！ et5"是一个强密码，但"House27"是弱密码。

trans-unit.source: Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down.
trans-unit.target: 使用你自己可以记住，以便无需将其记下的强密码。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Protect%2A> method to protect the structure of the workbook and workbook windows, but without specifying password protection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Protect%2A>方法来保护工作簿和工作簿 windows，但不会指定密码保护的结构。

trans-unit.source: The example then checks the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectStructure%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectWindows%2A> properties to verify that this protection is set.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectStructure%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectWindows%2A>属性，以验证设置此保护。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Called by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] so that you can reapply password protection to the workbook after the cached data has been saved.
trans-unit.target: 由 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 调用，以便可在保存缓存数据后，重新对工作簿应用密码保护。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a document-level project for Excel if your workbook is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的工作簿受密码保护，而且它包含的缓存的数据，可能在运行时更改 Excel 重写此方法在文档级项目中。

trans-unit.source: In your implementation of this method, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Protect%2A> method to protect the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 在你实现此方法中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Protect%2A>方法来保护工作簿。

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected workbook are not persisted when the workbook is saved.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对受密码保护的工作簿中的缓存数据的更改不会保留在保存工作簿时。

trans-unit.source: To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project:
trans-unit.target: 若要将更改保存到缓存的数据，必须在你的项目中重写以下方法：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 保存工作簿后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 将代码添加到此方法的暂时取消保护该工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This enables changes to the cached data to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 这使对缓存的数据要保存更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 保存工作簿后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 将代码添加到此方法的重新应用到的工作簿的保护。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Password-Protected 文档中缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md)。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A> method even if the cached data could not be saved because of some error that is unrelated to the password protection.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A>方法，即使由于无关密码保护某些错误，无法保存缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you implement the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType> interface to customize how cached data is stored in the document, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A> method is called even if your <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType> implementation throws an exception that prevents the cached data from being saved.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你实现<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType>接口可自定义缓存的数据的方式存储在文档中，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A>调用方法即使你<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.ICachedType>实现引发了异常，防止保存缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A> method to reapply protection that was removed by overriding the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UnprotectDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A>方法以重新应用已通过重写中删除的保护<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, run it from the `ThisWorkbook` class in a document-level project for Excel.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，可以从运行`ThisWorkbook`Excel 的文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码假定该密码存储在名为的字段中`securelyStoredPassword`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the saved file.
trans-unit.target: 保存的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can include a full path; if you do not, Microsoft Office Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 可以包含完整路径；否则，Microsoft Office Excel 将文件保存在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: A case-sensitive password for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿的密码，区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, you can unprotect the workbook without using a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则无需使用密码即可取消保护工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must specify the password to unprotect the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 否则，必须指定密码才能取消保护工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The write-reservation password for this file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的写保护密码。

trans-unit.source: If a file is saved with the password and the password is not supplied when the file is opened, the file is opened read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果保存文件时指定了密码，但打开文件时没有提供密码，则该文件以只读方式打开。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a message when the file is opened, recommending that the file be opened read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在打开该文件时显示一条消息，建议以只读方式打开该文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create a backup file.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则创建备份文件。

trans-unit.source: The password to be used to protect the file for sharing.
trans-unit.target: 要用来保护文件共享的密码。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the file format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示文件格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Saves the workbook and protects it for sharing.
trans-unit.target: 保存工作簿，并进行共享保护。

trans-unit.source: Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
trans-unit.target: 使用强密码合并大写和小写字母、 数字和符号。

trans-unit.source: Weak passwords do not mix these elements.
trans-unit.target: 弱密码不同时包含这些元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, "Y6dh!et5" is a strong password, but "House27" is a weak password.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"Y6dh ！ et5"是一个强密码，但"House27"是弱密码。

trans-unit.source: Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down.
trans-unit.target: 使用你自己可以记住，以便无需将其记下的强密码。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the order of the sheets in the workbook is protected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作簿中的表的顺序是否受保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the order of the sheets in the workbook is protected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿中的表的顺序受保护，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The example then checks the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectStructure%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectWindows%2A> properties to verify that this protection is set.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectStructure%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectWindows%2A>属性，以验证设置此保护。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the windows of the workbook are protected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作簿窗口是否受保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the windows of the workbook are protected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿窗口受保护，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Protect%2A> method to protect the structure of the workbook and workbook windows, but without specifying password protection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Protect%2A>方法来保护工作簿和工作簿 windows，但不会指定密码保护的结构。

trans-unit.source: The example then checks the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectStructure%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectWindows%2A> properties to verify that this protection is set.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectStructure%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectWindows%2A>属性，以验证设置此保护。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。
