trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PublishObjects" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PublishObjects" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PublishObjects" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PublishObjects%2A> property to publish all static <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PublishObject?displayProperty=fullName> items in the active workbook to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PublishObjects%2A>发布所有静态属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PublishObject?displayProperty=fullName>到 Web 页的活动工作簿中的项。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The number of days that changes in the change log are to be retained.
trans-unit.target: 更改日志中的更改要保留的天数。

trans-unit.source: The password that unprotects the workbook for sharing.
trans-unit.target: 取消对工作簿的共享保护的密码。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is protected for sharing with a password and this argument is omitted, the user is prompted for the password.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿的共享保护使用了密码，但省略了此参数，则会提示用户输入密码。

trans-unit.source: Removes entries from the change log for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 从工作簿的更改日志中移除项。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workbook has been opened as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已用只读方式打开工作簿。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook has been opened as read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已用只读方式打开工作簿，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is used only for lists that are linked to a SharePoint site.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅用于链接到 SharePoint 站点的列表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnlyRecommended%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnly%2A> property is `false`, and then prompts the user to set the file access to read-only by calling the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ChangeFileAccess%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息，如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnlyRecommended%2A>属性是`true`和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnly%2A>属性是`false`，然后会提示用户设置的文件访问权限为只读的通过调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ChangeFileAccess%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workbook was saved as read-only recommended.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作簿是否保存为建议的只读方式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook was saved as read-only recommended; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿保存为建议的只读方式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When you open a workbook that was saved as read-only recommended, Microsoft Office Excel displays a message recommending that you open the workbook as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 打开以只读方式已保存建议的工作簿时，Microsoft Office Excel 会显示条消息，建议你打开工作簿为只读。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAs%2A> method to change this property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAs%2A>方法可以更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message box if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnlyRecommended%2A> property is `true` and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnly%2A> property is `false`, and then prompts the user to set the file access to read-only by calling the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ChangeFileAccess%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一个消息框，如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnlyRecommended%2A>属性是`true`和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReadOnly%2A>属性是`false`，然后会提示用户设置的文件访问权限为只读的通过调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ChangeFileAccess%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes all external data ranges and PivotTable reports in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 刷新工作簿中的所有外部数据范围和数据透视表。

trans-unit.source: Objects that have the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotCache.BackgroundQuery%2A> property set to `true` are refreshed in the background.
trans-unit.target: 对象具有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotCache.BackgroundQuery%2A>属性设置为`true`在后台刷新。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime" /> values that specifies when the changes to be rejected were made.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlHighlightChangesTime" /> 值中的一个，指定要拒绝的更改是在何时进行的。

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies who made the changes to be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 一个标识进行要拒绝的更改的人的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Can be "Everyone", "Everyone but Me", or the name of one of the users of the shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 可以是“Everyone”、“Everyone but Me”或共享工作簿的用户名之一。

trans-unit.source: An A1-style range reference that specifies the location of the changes to be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 指定要拒绝的更改的位置的 A1 样式范围引用。

trans-unit.source: Rejects all changes in the shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 拒绝共享工作簿中的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The encoding that is to be applied to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于工作簿的编码。

trans-unit.source: Reloads a workbook based on an HTML document, using the specified document encoding.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定文档编码重新加载基于 HTML 文档的工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReloadAs%2A> method to reload the workbook using the Western document encoding.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReloadAs%2A>方法重新加载工作簿使用西方文档的编码。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current workbook is based on an HTML document.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定到当前工作簿基于 HTML 文档。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Removes the customization that was created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio from the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 从工作簿移除使用 Visual Studio 的 Office 开发工具创建的自定义。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the customization by performing the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以通过执行以下任务来删除自定义项：

trans-unit.source: It deletes the `_AssemblyName` and `_AssemblyLocation` custom properties from the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 它将删除`_AssemblyName`和`_AssemblyLocation`从工作簿的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Document Properties Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义文档属性概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: It deletes the cached data from the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 它从工作簿中删除缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cached data, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关缓存数据的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method might throw an <xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException> if the workbook is protected.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能引发<xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException>如果工作簿受到保护。

trans-unit.source: You should remove any protection from the workbook before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，应从工作簿删除任何保护。

trans-unit.source: The custom document properties or the cached data could not be removed from the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 无法从工作簿移除自定义文档属性或缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: The document is protected.
trans-unit.target: 文档是受保护的。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRemoveDocInfoType" /> values that specifies the type of information to be removed.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRemoveDocInfoType" /> 值之一，指定要移除的信息的类型。

trans-unit.source: Removes all information of the specified type from the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 从工作簿中移除指定类型的所有信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes all the workbook properties of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例会取消当前的工作簿的所有工作簿属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether personal information can be removed from the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示个人信息是否可从工作簿中移除。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if personal information can be removed from the workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果个人信息可从工作簿中移除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The user index.
trans-unit.target: 用户索引。

trans-unit.source: Disconnects the specified user from the shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: 从共享工作簿断开指定用户的连接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the message; <see langword="false" /> to not display the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则显示该邮件；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则不显示该邮件。

trans-unit.source: Sends an e-mail message to the author of a workbook that has been sent out for review, notifying him or her that a reviewer has completed review of the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 向已发送审阅的工作簿的作者发送电子邮件，通知他或她审阅者已完成对该工作簿的审阅。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendForReview%2A> method to start a collaborative review of a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendForReview%2A>方法以启动工作簿的协作审阅。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReplyWithChanges%2A> method is executed on a workbook that is not part of a collaborative review cycle, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReplyWithChanges%2A>方法执行不协作审阅循环的一部分的工作簿，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReplyWithChanges%2A> method to send a notification to the author of a review workbook that a reviewer has completed a review, after displaying the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ReplyWithChanges%2A>方法将通知发送给作者审阅的工作簿的审阅者已完成审阅之后显示了电子邮件消息。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the active workbook is part of a collaborative review cycle.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定活动工作簿是协作审阅循环的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个标识 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility" /> 接口的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface in a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 返回在文档级自定义项中实现 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object in your document-level customization that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 文档级自定义项中实现 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you are customizing the Ribbon of the workbook by creating your own implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface or by adding a **Ribbon (XML)** item to your project.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过自定义功能区中的工作簿创建您自己的实现重写此方法`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口或通过添加**功能区 (XML)**到你的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: If you customize the Ribbon by adding a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to your project, Visual Studio overrides this method for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过添加自定义功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到你的项目，Visual Studio 重写此方法为你。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md) and [Ribbon Designer](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview.md)和[功能区设计器](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, check the value of the `serviceGuid` parameter to determine whether the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface is being requested, and then return an object that implements the interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写此方法，请检查的值`serviceGuid`参数，以确定是否`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口正在请求、，然后返回实现该接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: When your workbook is opened, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RequestService%2A>, and it sends the return value to Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 当打开你的工作簿时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RequestService%2A>，然后它将返回的值发送到 Microsoft Office Excel。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface, see [IRibbonExtensibility Object](HV10096517) in the Microsoft Office documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口，请参阅[IRibbonExtensibility 对象](HV10096517)Microsoft Office 文档中。

trans-unit.source: You can alternatively override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A> method instead of overriding the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RequestService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者可以重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A>方法而非重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RequestService%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。

trans-unit.source: `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` is one of several interfaces (also named *extensibility interfaces*) that are provided by Microsoft Office.
trans-unit.target: `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` 是多个接口 (也名为*扩展性接口*) 提供的 Microsoft Office。

trans-unit.source: However, this is the only interface that you can implement in a document-level customization for Excel.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这是可以在 Excel 的文档级自定义项中实现的唯一接口。

trans-unit.source: You can implement other extensibility interfaces in application-level add-ins. For more information, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md).
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级外接程序，可以实现其他扩展性接口。有关详细信息，请参阅[UI 功能通过使用扩展性接口自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the research service for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示工作簿的信息检索服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Research</c> object that represents the research service for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Research</c>表示工作簿的信息检索服务对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example accesses the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Research` object of the document to set the default language pair that is used in the translation service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例访问`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Research`文档设置为使用的默认语言对翻译服务中的对象。

trans-unit.source: It sets English (US) as the language of the source text to translate from and Japanese as the language to translate the text to.
trans-unit.target: 它将英语 （美国） 设置为要将转换的源文本和为语言的日语转换到的文本的语言。

trans-unit.source: The default translation languages appear in the **Research** pane in Excel under the **Translation** section.
trans-unit.target: 默认的翻译语言显示在**研究**下的 Excel 中窗格**转换**部分。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Resets the color palette to the default colors.
trans-unit.target: 将调色板重置为默认颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of times the workbook has been saved while open as a shared list.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿作为共享列表打开期间的保存次数。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is open in exclusive mode, this property returns 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿以独占模式打开，则此属性返回 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the workbook has been saved while open as a shared list.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿作为共享列表打开期间的保存次数。

trans-unit.source: This property is updated only when the local copy of the workbook is saved, not when remote copies are saved.
trans-unit.target: 仅当远程副本保存时不保存该工作簿的本地副本时，都会更新此属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user navigates through the recordset or invokes the rowset action on an OLAP PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在记录集中导航或对 OLAP 数据透视表调用行集合操作时发生。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRunAutoMacro" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRunAutoMacro" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Runs the Auto_Open, Auto_Close, Auto_Activate, or Auto_Deactivate macro attached to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 运行附加到工作簿的 Auto_Open、Auto_Close、Auto_Activate 或 Auto_Deactivate 宏。

trans-unit.source: This method is included for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 包含此方法是为了向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: You should use the Open, Close, Activate and Deactivate events instead of these macros.
trans-unit.target: 应使用 Open、Close、Activate 和 Deactivate 事件代替这些宏。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RunAutoMacros%2A> method to run the Auto_Activate macro.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.RunAutoMacros%2A>要运行的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Saves changes to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 保存对工作簿所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: The first time you save a workbook, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAs%2A> method to specify a name for the file.
trans-unit.target: 第一次保存工作簿，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAs%2A>方法，以指定文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 要保存的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can include a full path; if you do not, Microsoft Office Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 可以包含完整路径；否则，Microsoft Office Excel 将文件保存在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileFormat" /> values that specifies the file format to use when you save the file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFileFormat" /> 值之一，指定保存文件时要使用的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: For an existing file, the default format is the last file format specified; for a new file, the default is the format of the version of Excel being used.
trans-unit.target: 对于现有文件，默认格式为最后一种指定文件格式；对于新文件，默认格式为所用 Excel 版本的格式。

trans-unit.source: A case-sensitive string (no more than 15 characters) that indicates the protection password to be given to the file.
trans-unit.target: 一个区分大小写的字符串（不超过 15 个字符），指示为文件指定的保护密码。

trans-unit.source: The write-reservation password for this file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的写保护密码。

trans-unit.source: If a file is saved with the password and the password is not supplied when the file is opened, the file is opened as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果保存文件时指定了密码，但打开文件时没有提供密码，则该文件以只读方式打开。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a message when the file is opened, recommending that the file be opened as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在打开该文件时显示一条消息，建议以只读方式打开该文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to create a backup file.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则创建备份文件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSaveAsAccessMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSaveAsAccessMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSaveConflictResolution" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlSaveConflictResolution" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add this workbook to the list of recently used files.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将工作簿添加到最近使用的文件列表中。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Not used in U.S. English Excel.
trans-unit.target: 不在美国使用英语 Excel。

trans-unit.source: Not used in U.S. English Excel.
trans-unit.target: 不在美国使用英语 Excel。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> saves files against the language of Excel (including control panel settings).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则按照 Excel（包括控制面板设置）的语言保存文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> (default) saves files against the language of Visual Basic for Applications (VBA).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />（默认值），则按照 Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) 的语言保存文件。

trans-unit.source: Saves changes to the workbook in a different file.
trans-unit.target: 在另一个文件中保存对工作簿所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio does not support saving a workbook as a shared workbook.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 不支持将工作簿另存为共享的工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FileFormat%2A> property to determine whether the workbook is a normal workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.FileFormat%2A>属性来确定工作簿是否正常工作簿。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is a normal workbook, then the example calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet.SaveAs%2A> method to resave the workbook as an XML spreadsheet with the name `XMLCopy.xlsx` in the path specified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿是否正常工作簿，然后该示例调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet.SaveAs%2A>方法来重新工作簿保存为 XML 电子表格同名`XMLCopy.xlsx`中指定的路径<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Path%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 要保存的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can include a full path; if you do not, Microsoft Office Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 可以包含完整路径；否则，Microsoft Office Excel 将文件保存在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The schema map to apply to the data.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于数据的架构映射。

trans-unit.source: Exports the data that has been mapped to the specified XML schema map to an XML data file.
trans-unit.target: 将映射到指定 XML 架构映射的数据导出到 XML 数据文件。

trans-unit.source: This method will result in a run-time error if Excel cannot export data with the specified schema map.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Excel 无法导出与指定的架构映射的数据，此方法将导致运行时错误。

trans-unit.source: To check whether Excel can use the specified schema map to export data, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap.IsExportable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查是否 Excel 可以使用指定的架构映射将数据导出，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap.IsExportable%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to export XML data from a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从工作簿中导出 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The example imports the XML data from a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> into a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> in the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 此示例导入 XML 数据从<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>当前工作簿中。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A> method to export the data from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> into an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A>方法将数据从导出<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>到 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A> method is called, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlExport> event handler reports that the XML is being exported, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlExport> event handler reports whether the XML was successfully exported.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAsXMLData%2A>调用方法时，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlExport>事件处理程序会报告，正在导出的 XML，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlExport>事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导出 XML。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the file name for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 指定副本的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Saves a copy of the workbook to a file but does not modify the open workbook in memory.
trans-unit.target: 将工作簿的副本保存到文件中，但不修改内存中打开的工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveCopyAs%2A> method to save a copy of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveCopyAs%2A>方法以将保存当前的工作簿的副本。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether no changes have been made to the workbook since it was last saved.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作簿自上次保存以来是否进行了更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if no changes have been made to the workbook since it was last saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿自上次保存以来进行了更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If a workbook has never been saved, its <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Path%2A> property returns an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果从未保存过工作簿，其<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Path%2A>属性返回一个空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to `true` if you want to close a modified workbook without either saving it or being prompted to save it.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将此属性设置为`true`如果你想要关闭而不保存或不被提示将其保存已修改的工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeClose> event that prompts the user to either save changes, not save changes, or cancel the close operation if changes have been made to the workbook since it was last saved.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeClose>会提示用户进行保存更改，不保存更改，或如果该工作簿自上次保存后进行了更改，则取消关闭操作的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not save changes, then the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Saved%2A> property of the workbook is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not prompt the user to save the workbook when the close operation continues.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户不保存更改，则<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Saved%2A>工作簿的属性设置为`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不会提示用户保存工作簿时，继续执行关闭操作。

trans-unit.source: If the user cancels the close operation, then the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_BeforeCloseEventHandler> event handler is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not close the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户取消关闭操作，则`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_BeforeCloseEventHandler>事件处理程序设置为`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不会关闭工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Excel saves external link values with the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Excel 是否将外部链接值与工作簿一起保存。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Excel saves external link values with the workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Excel 将外部链接值与工作簿一起保存，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The fax numbers and e-mail addresses of the people to whom the fax will be sent.
trans-unit.target: 要向其发送传真的收件人的传真号码和电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Separate multiple recipients with a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: 用分号分隔多个收件人。

trans-unit.source: The subject line for the faxed document.
trans-unit.target: 传真文档的主题行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> displays the fax message before sending it; <see langword="false" /> sends the fax without displaying the fax message.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在发送传真邮件前显示该邮件；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则发送传真但不显示传真邮件。

trans-unit.source: Sends the active sheet in the workbook as a fax to the specified recipients.
trans-unit.target: 将工作簿中的活动工作表作为传真发送给指定收件人。

trans-unit.source: Using this method requires that the fax service is enabled on a user's computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法需要用户的计算机上启用了传真服务。

trans-unit.source: The format used for specifying fax numbers in the `Recipients` parameter is either `recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider` or `recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber`.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定中的传真号码的格式`Recipients`参数可以是`recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider`或`recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber`。

trans-unit.source: You can access the user's fax provider information using the following registry path:
trans-unit.target: 您可以访问用户的传真提供程序信息使用以下注册表路径：

trans-unit.source: Use the value of the FaxAddress key at this registry path to determine the format to use for a recipient.
trans-unit.target: 在此注册表路径中使用 FaxAddress 键的值来确定要使用的收件人的格式。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendFaxOverInternet%2A> method to send the current workbook as a fax and display the fax message before sending it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendFaxOverInternet%2A>方法作为传真发送当前工作簿并发送之前显示传真邮件。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The people to whom to send the message.
trans-unit.target: 邮件收件人。

trans-unit.source: These can be unresolved names and aliases in an e-mail phone book or full e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: 这些收件人可以是电子邮件电话簿中未解析的名称和别名，或完整的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Separate multiple recipients with a semicolon (;).
trans-unit.target: 用分号 (;) 分隔多个收件人。

trans-unit.source: If left blank and <c>ShowMessage</c> is <see langword="false" />, you will receive an error message, and the message will not be sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果留空且 <c>ShowMessage</c> 为 <see langword="false" />，则会接收一条错误消息，且不会发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: The subject of the message.
trans-unit.target: 邮件的主题。

trans-unit.source: If left blank, the subject will be: Please review "<c>filename</c> ".
trans-unit.target: 如果留为空白，则主题将为：请查看“<c>filename</c>”。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the message should be displayed when the method is executed.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示该方法执行时是否应显示邮件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If set to <see langword="false" />, the message is automatically sent to the recipients without first showing the message to the sender.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 <see langword="false" />，则邮件会自动发送给收件人，而不首先向发件人显示邮件。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the message should include an attachment or a link to a server location.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示邮件是否应包含附件或到服务器位置的链接。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If set to <see langword="false" />, the document must be stored at a shared location.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 <see langword="false" />，则必须将文档存储在共享位置。

trans-unit.source: Sends a workbook in an e-mail message for review to the specified recipients.
trans-unit.target: 在电子邮件中将工作簿发送给指定收件人进行审阅。

trans-unit.source: This method starts a collaborative review cycle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会启动协作审阅周期。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.EndReview%2A> method to end a review cycle.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.EndReview%2A>方法来结束审阅循环。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendForReview%2A> method to send the workbook in an e-mail to two recipients.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendForReview%2A>方法向两个收件人发送一封电子邮件中的工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The e-mail will have the default subject line and will include the workbook as an attachment.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件将具有默认的主题行，并且将包含作为附件的工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the recipient names resolve to valid e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定收件人的名称解析为有效的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the recipient as text, or as an array of text strings if there are multiple recipients.
trans-unit.target: 以文本格式指定收件人姓名，或以文本字符串数组的格式指定收件人（如果有多个）。

trans-unit.source: At least one recipient must be specified, and all recipients are added as To recipients.
trans-unit.target: 必须至少指定一个收件人，所有收件人都以“To recipient”的格式添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the subject of the message.
trans-unit.target: 指定邮件的主题。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the document name is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用文档名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to request a return receipt.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则请求回执。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to not request a return receipt.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则不请求回执。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the workbook by using the installed mail system.
trans-unit.target: 使用安装的邮件系统发送工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendMail%2A> method to send the workbook in an e-mail to a single recipient.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SendMail%2A>方法将工作簿中一封电子邮件发送给一个收件人。

trans-unit.source: The e-mail will have the subject "Please review" and will not request a return receipt.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件将使用者"请查看"，然后将不会请求返回回执。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents a policy specified for a workbook that is stored on a server running Microsoft Office SharePoint Server.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示为运行 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 的服务器上存储的工作簿指定的策略。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.ServerPolicy</c> object that represents a policy specified for a workbook that is stored on a server running SharePoint Server.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.ServerPolicy</c>表示策略存储在运行 SharePoint Server 的服务器的工作簿为指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the information management policy associated with the current workbook and displays the policy name, description, and statement.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索与当前工作簿关联的信息管理策略，并显示策略名称、 说明和语句。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, you must publish the workbook to a Microsoft Office Sharepoint Server site and define an information management policy in the site.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，必须将工作簿发布到 Microsoft Office Sharepoint Server 站点，并在站点定义信息管理策略。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that you can use to interact with the list of published objects in the workbook that are shown on a Microsoft Office SharePoint Server server.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于与 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 服务器上显示的工作簿中的已发布对象列表进行交互。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ServerViewableItems</c> object that you can use to interact with the list of published objects in the workbook that are shown on the server.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ServerViewableItems</c>可以使用与的列表进行交互的对象在服务器显示的工作簿中发布对象。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a collection of the items in the workbook that you can publish to Excel Services.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其发布到 Excel Services 工作簿中，此属性返回的项的集合。

trans-unit.source: Only objects in this collection will be shown on the server.
trans-unit.target: 在服务器上，将显示仅在此集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, the entire workbook (including all worksheets) is shown.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，显示整个工作簿 （包括所有工作表）。

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ServerViewableItems?displayProperty=fullName> object can exist per workbook.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ServerViewableItems?displayProperty=fullName>对象可以存在每个工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This collection cannot be indexed by name, because there is no guarantee that the names of objects that are marked as viewable on the server are unique.
trans-unit.target: 此集合不能按名称，索引，因为没有被标记为可查看服务器上的对象的名称是唯一不能保证。

trans-unit.source: In the Excel user interface, you can view the collection of objects that are marked as viewable on the server in the **Excel Services Options** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在 Excel 用户界面中，你可以查看的对象被标记为可在服务器上查看的集合**Excel Services 选项**对话框。

trans-unit.source: The name of the DDE/OLE link, as returned from the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: DDE/OLE 链接的名称（和从 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources(System.Object)" /> 方法返回的一样）。

trans-unit.source: The name of the procedure to be run when the link is updated.
trans-unit.target: 更新链接时要运行的过程的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can be either a Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 macro or a Visual Basic procedure.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是 Microsoft Office Excel 4.0 宏或 Visual Basic 过程。

trans-unit.source: Set this argument to an empty string ("") to indicate that no procedure should run when the link is updated.
trans-unit.target: 将此参数设置为空字符串 ("") 可指示在更新链接时不应运行任何过程。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of a procedure that runs whenever a DDE link is updated.
trans-unit.target: 设置每次更新 DDE 链接时运行的过程的名称。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the collection of all DDE links in the current workbook and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetLinkOnData%2A> method to run a macro named `UPDATE_MACRO` whenever one of the links is updated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取当前工作簿中的所有 DDE 链接的集合，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetLinkOnData%2A>方法来运行一个名为宏`UPDATE_MACRO`每当更新链接之一。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A case sensitive string of the encryption provider.
trans-unit.target: 加密提供程序的字符串，区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: A case sensitive string of the algorithmic short name (i.e. "RC4").
trans-unit.target: 算法短名称的区分大小写的字符串（例如“RC4”）。

trans-unit.source: The encryption key length, which is a multiple of 8 (40 or greater).
trans-unit.target: 加密密钥长度，为 8 的倍数（40 或更大）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> (default) to encrypt file properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />（默认值），则加密文件属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the options for encrypting the workbook using a password.
trans-unit.target: 设置使用密码加密工作簿的选项。

trans-unit.source: The `PasswordEncryptionProvider`, `PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm`, and `PasswordEncryptionKeyLength` parameters are not independent of each other.
trans-unit.target: `PasswordEncryptionProvider`， `PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm`，和`PasswordEncryptionKeyLength`参数不是相互独立。

trans-unit.source: A selected encryption provider limits the set of algorithms and key length that can be chosen.
trans-unit.target: 所选的加密提供程序限制算法和密钥长度，可以选择的组。

trans-unit.source: For the `PasswordEncryptionKeyLength` parameter there is no inherent limit on the range of the key length.
trans-unit.target: 有关`PasswordEncryptionKeyLength`有参数是没有固有的密钥长度范围上限。

trans-unit.source: The range is determined by the Cryptographic Service Provider which also determines the cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 它还确定加密算法加密服务提供程序由确定范围。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A> property to determine whether the workbook is password protected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.HasPassword%2A>属性来确定工作簿是否受密码保护。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A> property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受密码保护，然后该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Password%2A>的密码的属性获取用户输入，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法来设置加密算法、 设置的密钥长度、 设定的加密提供程序的名称并启用文件属性加密。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A> properties in worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例显示的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionProvider%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionKeyLength%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.PasswordEncryptionFileProperties%2A>工作表中的属性`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method `GetPasswordFromUserInput` is defined elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定方法`GetPasswordFromUserInput`其他位置定义。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.SharedWorkspace</c> that represents the Document Workspace in which the workbook is located.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.SharedWorkspace</c>，它表示工作簿所在的文档工作区。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.SharedWorkspace</c> that represents the Document Workspace in which the workbook is located.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.SharedWorkspace</c>表示工作簿所在的文档工作区。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SharedWorkspace%2A> property to determine whether the current workbook is part of a Document Workspace.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SharedWorkspace%2A>属性来确定当前的工作簿是否为文档工作区的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is part of a Document Workspace, then the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Sync%2A> property to display the user who last changed the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿是一部分的文档工作区中，则该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Sync%2A>属性来显示用户上次更改文档。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Included for backwards compatibility only.
trans-unit.target: 包含它仅为了向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any worksheet is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在双击任意工作表之后，默认的双击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur on chart sheets.
trans-unit.target: 图表工作表时，此事件不会发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetBeforeDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetBeforeDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler informs the user that double-clicking is not allowed for the worksheet, and then sets the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_SheetBeforeDoubleClickEventHandler> event handler to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel cancels the double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序告知用户双击不允许进行的工作表，然后设置`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_SheetBeforeDoubleClickEventHandler>事件处理程序`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 取消双击操作。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any worksheet is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在右击任意工作表之后，默认的右击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur on chart sheets.
trans-unit.target: 图表工作表时，此事件不会发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetBeforeRightClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetBeforeRightClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler informs the user that right-clicking is not allowed for the worksheet, and then sets the `Cancel` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_SheetBeforeRightClickEventHandler> event handler to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel cancels the right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序通知的用户，右键单击不允许的工作表，然后设置`Cancel`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WorkbookEvents_SheetBeforeRightClickEventHandler>事件处理程序`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 取消右键单击操作。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after any worksheet is recalculated or after any changed data is plotted on a chart.
trans-unit.target: 在重新计算任何工作表后或将任何更改的数据绘制在图表上后发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetCalculate> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetCalculate>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays the name of the worksheet that is being calculated.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序会显示正在计算的工作表的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when cells in any worksheet are changed by the user or by an external link.
trans-unit.target: 在用户或外部链接更改任何工作表中的单元格时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur on chart sheets.
trans-unit.target: 图表工作表时，此事件不会发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetChange>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays the name of the worksheet and the range of cells that were changed.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序显示的工作表的名称和已更改的单元格范围。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Included for backwards compatibility only.
trans-unit.target: 包含它仅为了向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when you click any hyperlink in a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 在单击工作簿中的任何超链接时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetFollowHyperlink> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetFollowHyperlink>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler keeps a list of all the hyperlinks in the current workbook that have been clicked, plus the names of the worksheets that contain these hyperlinks, in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序已单击当前工作簿加上的名称中包含这些超链接，工作表中保留所有超链接的列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a cell or range of cells inside a PivotTable are edited or recalculated (for cells that contain formulas).
trans-unit.target: 在对数据透视表内的单元格或单元格范围进行编辑或重新计算（针对包含公式的单元格）后发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.SheetPivotTableAfterValueChange> event does not occur under any conditions other than editing or recalculating cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.SheetPivotTableAfterValueChange>事件不会在编辑或重新计算单元格以外的任何情况下发生。

trans-unit.source: For example, it will not occur when the PivotTable is refreshed, sorted, filtered, or drilled down on, even though those operations move cells and potentially retrieve new values from the OLAP data source.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它时不会出现数据透视表是刷新、 排序、 筛选，或向下钻取，即使这些操作移动单元格，并可能从 OLAP 数据源中检索新值。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before changes are applied to a PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: 在将更改应用于数据透视表之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetPivotTableBeforeAllocateChanges> event occurs immediately before Excel executes an UPDATE CUBE statement to apply all changes to the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to apply changes in the user interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetPivotTableBeforeAllocateChanges> Excel 立即执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句以将所有更改都应用到数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源之前, 和用户已选择的用户界面以都应用更改后立即时发生事件。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before changes are committed against the OLAP data source for a PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: 在针对 OLAP 数据源提交数据透视表的更改之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetPivotTableBeforeCommitChanges> event occurs immediately before Excel executes a COMMIT TRANSACTION against the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to save changes for the whole PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetPivotTableBeforeCommitChanges> Excel 立即执行针对数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源，提交事务之前，用户已选择为整个数据透视表中保存更改后立即发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before changes to a PivotTable are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 在放弃对数据透视表的更改之前发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs immediately before Excel executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP data source, if a transaction is still active, and then discards all edited values in the PivotTable, after the user has chosen to discard changes.
trans-unit.target: Excel 执行针对 OLAP 数据源，ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句，如果在事务仍处于活动状态，且然后用户已选择放弃所做的更改之后将丢弃所有数据透视表中, 编辑过的值之前，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after changes to a PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: 在对数据透视表进行更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetPivotTableChangeSync> occurs during most changes to a PivotTable, so that you can write code to respond to user actions, such as clearing, grouping, or refreshing items in the PivotTable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetPivotTableChangeSync>过程中发生的大多数更改在数据透视表，以便你可以编写代码以响应用户操作，例如清除、 分组或刷新数据透视表中的项。

trans-unit.source: This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the sheet of a PivotTable report has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 在更新数据透视表的工作表后发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetPivotTableUpdate> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetPivotTableUpdate>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays a message when the sheet of a PivotTable report has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 已更新数据透视表的表时，事件处理程序将显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿中的所有工作表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，表示工作簿中的所有工作表。

trans-unit.source: The collection includes worksheets, charts, dialog sheets and macro sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 集合包含工作簿中工作表、 图表、 对话框表和宏工作表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Sheets%2A> property to display the number of sheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Sheets%2A>属性来显示工作簿中的表数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selection changes on any worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 所选内容在任何工作表上更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Does not occur if the selection is on a chart sheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果所选内容位于图表工作表上，则不发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetSelectionChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SheetSelectionChange>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays the sheet name and address of the selected range in the status bar.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序在状态栏中显示的表名称和所选范围的地址。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Conflict History worksheet is visible in the workbook that is open as a shared list.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示冲突历史记录工作表在作为共享列表打开的工作簿中是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Conflict History worksheet is visible in the workbook that is open as a shared list; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果冲突历史记录工作表在作为共享列表打开的工作簿中可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not open as a shared list, this property fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿未打开作为共享列表，该属性无效。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a workbook is open as a shared list, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.MultiUserEditing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否已为共享的列表打开工作簿，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.MultiUserEditing%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the PivotChart Filter Pane is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据透视图筛选窗格是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the PivotChart Filter Pane is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据透视图筛选窗格可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To display the PivotChart Filter Pane, select a PivotChart object.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示数据透视图筛选器窗格中，选择一个数据透视图对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the PivotTable field list can be shown.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据透视表字段列表是否能够显示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the PivotTable field list can be shown; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据透视表字段列表能够显示，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workbook host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 在工作簿宿主项关闭时发生。

trans-unit.source: This is the last event to be called in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase> class as the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase> class unloads.
trans-unit.target: 这是要在中调用的最后一个事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>类作为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>类卸载。

trans-unit.source: Use this event for any additional clean up.
trans-unit.target: 此事件用于任何其他清理过程。

trans-unit.source: In a document-level customization, the application domain for the assembly unloads when the workbook host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 文档级自定义项，当工作簿主机项关闭时，将卸载程序集的应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: In an application-level add-in, the application domain does not unload when the workbook host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级外接程序，工作簿主机项关闭时，不会不卸载应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: Also, the underlying workbook object is no more available.
trans-unit.target: 此外，基础的工作簿对象将不再可用。

trans-unit.source: To access the workbook before it shuts down use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeClose> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问工作簿，关闭使用之前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeClose>相反。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Shutdown> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Shutdown>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays a message when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase> class unloads.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序会显示一条消息时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase>类卸载。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of digital signatures for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿的数字签名的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.SignatureSet</c> collection that contains the digital signatures for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.SignatureSet</c>集合，其中包含工作簿的数字签名。

trans-unit.source: To digitally sign Excel workbooks and verify other signatures in them, you need the Microsoft CryptoAPI and a unique digital signature certificate.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行数字签名 Excel 工作簿和验证其他中它们的签名，你需要 Microsoft CryptoAPI 和唯一的数字签名证书。

trans-unit.source: The CryptoAPI is installed with Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
trans-unit.target: CryptoAPI 被安装 Microsoft Internet 资源管理器 4.01 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a digital signature certificate from a certification authority.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从证书颁发机构获取数字签名证书。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the number of signatures that are attached to the current workbook and displays an appropriate message to the user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取签名附加到当前工作簿并向用户显示相应的消息数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.target: 获取与工作簿关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.SlicerCaches" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.SlicerCaches" /> object associated with the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 与工作簿关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.SlicerCaches" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: 此属性将出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示智能文档解决方案的设置的 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.SmartDocument</c>。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.SmartDocument</c> that represents the settings for a smart document solution.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.SmartDocument</c>表示智能文档解决方案的设置。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SmartDocument%2A>属性来显示一个对话框，允许用户选择要附加到文档的 XML 扩展包。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Styles" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿中的所有样式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Styles%2A> property to adjust some of the properties of each <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Style?displayProperty=fullName> in the workbook, including text wrapping, vertical and horizontal alignment, and hiding formulas.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Styles%2A>属性来调整每个属性中的一些<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Style?displayProperty=fullName>工作薄中包括的文本换行、 垂直和水平对齐方式，以及隐藏公式。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.Sync</c> object that provides access to the methods and properties of documents that are part of a Document Workspace.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.Sync</c> 对象，该对象提供对属于文档工作区的文档的方法和属性的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.Sync</c> object that provides access to the methods and properties of documents that are part of a Document Workspace.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.Sync</c>提供对的方法和属性的文档工作区的一部分的文档的访问的对象。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SharedWorkspace%2A>属性来确定当前的工作簿是否为文档工作区的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is part of a Document Workspace, then the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Sync%2A> property to display the user who last changed the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿是一部分的文档工作区中，则该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Sync%2A>属性来显示用户上次更改文档。
