trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of table styles that are used in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿中使用的表样式的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.TableStyles</c> collection that contains the table styles that are used in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.TableStyles</c>集合，其中包含工作簿中使用的表样式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default style of tables to `TableStyleDark11`, which is a style available in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置到的表的默认样式`TableStyleDark11`，这是一种样式中可用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.TableStyles%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The example then adds a table to verify the new table style.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例添加一个表以验证新的表格样式。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含有关工作簿的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data about the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，包含有关工作簿的数据。

trans-unit.source: A common use for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Tag%2A> property is to store data that is closely associated with the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见用途<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Tag%2A>属性是用于存储与工作簿紧密关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether external data references are removed when the workbook is saved as a template.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在将工作簿保存为模板时是否移除外部数据引用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if external data references are removed when the workbook is saved as a template; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在将工作簿保存为模板时移除外部数据引用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the theme that is applied to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于工作簿的主题。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.OfficeTheme</c> that represents the theme that is applied to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.OfficeTheme</c>表示应用于工作簿的主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves the theme of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索当前工作簿的主题。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the names of the major font and minor font found in the font scheme of the workbook theme.
trans-unit.target: 然后，此示例显示主要字体和在工作簿主题的字体方案中找到的次要字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Toggles Microsoft Office Excel into and out of design mode.
trans-unit.target: 将 Microsoft Office Excel 切换进和切换出设计模式。

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive password to use to unprotect the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 用于取消保护工作簿的密码，区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not protected with a password, this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿未使用密码保护，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter for a workbook that is protected with a password, the method fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果对使用密码保护的工作簿省略了此参数，则该方法会失败。

trans-unit.source: Removes protection from the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 从工作簿中移除保护。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect if the workbook is not protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受保护，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: If you forget the password, you cannot unprotect the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果你忘记了密码，则无法取消该工作簿。

trans-unit.source: It is a good idea to keep a list of your passwords and their corresponding document names in a safe place.
trans-unit.target: 最好将密码及其对应文档名的列表保存在安全的位置。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Protect%2A> method to protect the structure of the workbook and workbook windows, but without specifying password protection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Protect%2A>方法来保护工作簿和工作簿 windows，但不会指定密码保护的结构。

trans-unit.source: The example then prompts the user to unprotect the workbook by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Unprotect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例提示用户通过使用取消保护工作簿<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Unprotect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Called by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] so that you can remove password protection from the workbook and enable cached data to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 由 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 调用，以便可从工作簿移除密码保护，并能保存缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: Override this method in a document-level project for Excel if your workbook is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的工作簿受密码保护，而且它包含的缓存的数据，可能在运行时更改 Excel 重写此方法在文档级项目中。

trans-unit.source: In your implementation of this method, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Unprotect%2A> method to temporarily unprotect the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 在你实现此方法中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Unprotect%2A>暂时取消保护工作簿的方法。

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected workbook are not persisted when the workbook is saved.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对受密码保护的工作簿中的缓存数据的更改不会保留在保存工作簿时。

trans-unit.source: To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project:
trans-unit.target: 若要将更改保存到缓存的数据，必须在你的项目中重写以下方法：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 保存工作簿后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 将代码添加到此方法的暂时取消保护该工作簿。

trans-unit.source: This enables changes to the cached data to be saved.
trans-unit.target: 这使对缓存的数据要保存更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method.
trans-unit.target: 保存工作簿后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 将代码添加到此方法的重新应用到的工作簿的保护。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Password-Protected 文档中缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UnprotectDocument%2A> method to temporarily unprotect the workbook so that changes to the cached data can be saved.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UnprotectDocument%2A>方法暂时取消的工作簿保护，以便可以保存到缓存的数据的更改。

trans-unit.source: The example first saves the current <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectStructure%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectWindows%2A> values, so that the same type of protection can be reapplied later in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例首先将保存当前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectStructure%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectWindows%2A>值，以便可以更高版本中重新应用相同类型的保护<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.ProtectDocument%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, run it from the `ThisWorkbook` class in a document-level project for Excel.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，可以从运行`ThisWorkbook`Excel 的文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码假定该密码存储在名为的字段中`securelyStoredPassword`。

trans-unit.source: The workbook password.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿密码。

trans-unit.source: Turns off protection for sharing and saves the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 关闭共享保护并保存工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
trans-unit.target: 使用强密码合并大写和小写字母、 数字和符号。

trans-unit.source: Weak passwords do not mix these elements.
trans-unit.target: 弱密码不同时包含这些元素。

trans-unit.source: Strong password: Y6dh!et5.
trans-unit.target: 强密码： Y6dh ！ et5。

trans-unit.source: Weak password: House27.
trans-unit.target: 弱密码： House27。

trans-unit.source: Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down.
trans-unit.target: 使用你自己可以记住，以便无需将其记下的强密码。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Updates a read-only workbook from the saved disk version of the workbook if the disk version is more recent than the copy of the workbook that is loaded in memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁盘版本比内存中加载的工作簿副本更新，则从保存的工作簿磁盘版本更新只读工作簿。

trans-unit.source: If the disk copy has not changed since the workbook was loaded, the in-memory copy of the workbook is not reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果自加载工作簿以来还未更改过磁盘副本，则不重新加载工作簿的内存副本。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when a workbook is opened as read-only by user A and opened as read/write by user B. If user B saves a newer version of the workbook to disk while user A still has the workbook open, user A cannot get the updated copy without closing and reopening the workbook and losing view settings.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿是以只读方式打开由用户 A 和由用户 B.打开作为读/写时，此方法很有用如果用户 A 仍然具有工作簿打开，用户将无法获取更新的副本，而无需关闭和重新打开工作簿和丢失视图设置时，用户 B 将较新版本的工作簿保存到磁盘中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UpdateFromFile%2A> method updates the in-memory copy of the workbook from the disk file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UpdateFromFile%2A>方法更新内存中副本的磁盘文件中的工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Excel or DDE/OLE link to be updated, as returned from the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 要更新的 Excel 或 DDE/OLE 链接的名称（和从 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.LinkSources(System.Object)" /> 方法返回的一样）。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlLinkType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Updates a Microsoft Office Excel, DDE, or OLE link (or links).
trans-unit.target: 更新 Microsoft Office Excel、DDE 或 OLE 链接（或多个链接）。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called without any parameters, Excel defaults to updating all worksheet links.
trans-unit.target: 如果不带任何参数调用此方法时，Excel 将默认为更新工作表的所有链接。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an external link to an Excel workbook and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UpdateLink%2A> method to update the link.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Excel 工作簿的外部链接，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UpdateLink%2A>方法来更新链接。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that workbook Book2.xlsx exists at the root of the C directory.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定该工作簿 Book2.xlsx 位于 C 目录的根目录。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates a workbook's setting for updating embedded OLE links.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作簿用于更新嵌入的 OLE 链接的设置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlUpdateLinks" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlUpdateLinks" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UpdateLinks%2A> property to display how embedded OLE links are updated in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.UpdateLinks%2A>属性显示方式嵌入的 OLE 链接更新工作簿中。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Excel updates remote references in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Excel 是否更新工作簿中的远程引用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Excel updates remote references in the workbook; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Excel 更新工作簿中的远程引用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a 1-based, two-dimensional array that provides information about each user who has the workbook open as a shared list.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个二维数组（从 1 开始），该数组提供将工作簿打开为共享列表的每个用户的有关信息。

trans-unit.source: A 1-based, two-dimensional array that provides information about each user who has the workbook open as a shared list.
trans-unit.target: 二维数组（从 1 开始），该数组提供将工作簿打开为共享列表的每个用户的有关信息。

trans-unit.source: The first element of the second dimension is the name of the user, the second element is the date and time when the user last opened the workbook, and the third element is a number indicating the type of list (1 indicates exclusive, and 2 indicates shared).
trans-unit.target: 第二个维度的第一个元素是用户的名称，则第二个元素将日期和时间用户上一次打开工作簿，第三个元素是一个数字，指示列表的类型 （1 表示独占的而 2 表示共享）。

trans-unit.source: This property does not return information about users who have the specified workbook open as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不返回有关了指定的工作簿以只读方式打开用户的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the Visual Basic for Applications project for the workbook has been digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作簿的 Visual Basic for Applications 项目是否已进行了数字签名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Visual Basic for Applications project for the workbook has been digitally signed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿的 Visual Basic for Applications 项目已进行了数字签名，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.VBASigned%2A> property to display a message if the Visual Basic for Applications project for the workbook has not been digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.VBASigned%2A>属性显示一条消息，如果 Visual Basic for Applications 项目的工作簿未进行数字签名。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.VBProject</c> project that is in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作簿中的虚拟 <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.VBProject</c> 项目。

trans-unit.source: The virtual <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.VBProject</c> project that is in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟<c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.VBProject</c>工作簿中的项目。

trans-unit.source: This property refers to the Visual Basic for Applications project, not the Visual Basic project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是指 Visual Basic for Applications 项目，不是 Visual Basic 项目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.VBProject%2A> property to display the name of the Visual Basic for Applications project for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.VBProject%2A>属性显示为工作簿的应用程序项目的 Visual Basic 名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.SmartTagCollection" /> associated with the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取与工作簿关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.SmartTagCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.SmartTagCollection" /> associated with the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 与工作簿关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.SmartTagCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a smart tag that sets the font color of a cell to blue when the term "blue" is recognized.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建设置字体的颜色为蓝色"blue"术语识别时单元格的智能标记。

trans-unit.source: The example adds the smart tag to the workbook by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.VstoSmartTags%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 该示例通过向工作簿添加智能标记<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.VstoSmartTags%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WebOptions" /> collection, which contains workbook-level attributes used by Microsoft Office Excel when you save a document as a Web page or open a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WebOptions" /> 集合，该集合包含工作簿级特性，在将文档保存为网页或打开网页时 Microsoft Office Excel 将使用这些特性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WebOptions" /> collection, which contains workbook-level attributes used by Excel when you save a document as a Web page or open a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.WebOptions" /> 集合，包含工作簿级特性，在将文档保存为网页或打开网页时 Excel 将使用这些特性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WebOptions%2A> property to enable Portable Network Graphics (PNG) as an output format, download the Office Web components with the specified Web page if they are not already installed, and to allow long file names when the document is saved as a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WebOptions%2A>属性使可移植网络图形 (PNG) 作为输出格式，如果尚未安装，并将其以允许长文件名命名时下载 Office Web 组件与指定的 Web 页文档保存为网页。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Displays a preview of the workbook as it would look if saved as a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 显示与保存为网页效果相同的工作簿的预览。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any workbook window is activated.
trans-unit.target: 在激活任何工作簿窗口时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WindowActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WindowActivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler maximizes the workbook window that was activated.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序，从而已激活的工作簿窗口最大化。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any workbook window is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 在停用任何工作簿窗口时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WindowDeactivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WindowDeactivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler minimizes the workbook window that was deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序将被停用的工作簿窗口降至最低。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any workbook window is resized.
trans-unit.target: 在调整任意工作簿窗口的大小时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WindowResize> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WindowResize>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays the name that appears in the title bar of the workbook window that was resized.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序显示在已调整大小的工作簿窗口的标题栏中显示的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Windows" /> collection that represents all the windows in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Windows" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿中的所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Windows" /> collection that represents all the windows in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Windows" /> 集合，表示工作簿中的所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a collection of both visible and hidden windows.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回可见或隐藏窗口的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Windows%2A> property to display formulas, gridlines, and the outline of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Windows%2A>属性显示公式、 网格线和当前工作簿的轮廓。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the worksheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿中的所有工作表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> collection that represents all the worksheets in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Sheets" /> 集合，表示工作簿中的所有工作表。

trans-unit.source: This property does not return macro sheets, charts, or dialog sheets.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不返回宏工作表、 图表或对话框编辑表。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Sheets%2A> property to return those sheets as well as worksheets.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Sheets%2A>属性以返回这些表，以及工作表。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the specialized properties <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Excel4MacroSheets%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Excel4IntlMacroSheets%2A> to return macro sheets and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Charts%2A> property to return charts.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用的专用的属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Excel4MacroSheets%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Excel4IntlMacroSheets%2A>返回宏工作表和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Charts%2A>属性以返回图表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Worksheets%2A> property to make the second worksheet in the current workbook invisible.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.Worksheets%2A>属性以使当前工作簿中的第二个工作表中不可见。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the write password of a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工作簿的写密码。

trans-unit.source: The write password of a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 工作簿的写密码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WritePassword%2A> property is readable and returns ">>**".
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WritePassword%2A>属性是可读且返回">> * *"。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReserved%2A> property to determine whether the current workbook is write-reserved.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReserved%2A>属性来确定当前的工作簿是否受写保护。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not write-reserved, then the method sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WritePassword%2A> property to a password obtained through user input.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受写保护，则此方法将<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WritePassword%2A>获取通过用户输入的密码的属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReservedBy%2A> property to display the name of the user who saved the workbook as write-reserved.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReservedBy%2A>属性来显示该工作簿保存为写保留的用户的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the existence of a method named `GetPasswordFromUserInput` that obtains a strong password from user input.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定一个名为方法是否存在`GetPasswordFromUserInput`，从用户输入获取强密码。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workbook is write-reserved.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示工作簿是否受写保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workbook is write-reserved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿受写保护，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAs%2A> method to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.SaveAs%2A>方法以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReserved%2A> property to determine whether the current workbook is write-reserved.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReserved%2A>属性来确定当前的工作簿是否受写保护。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not write-reserved, then the method sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WritePassword%2A> property to a password obtained through user input.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受写保护，则此方法将<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WritePassword%2A>获取通过用户输入的密码的属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReservedBy%2A> property to display the name of the user who saved the workbook as write-reserved.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReservedBy%2A>属性来显示该工作簿保存为写保留的用户的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the existence of a method named `GetPasswordFromUserInput` that obtains a strong password from user input.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定一个名为方法是否存在`GetPasswordFromUserInput`，从用户输入获取强密码。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the user who currently has write permission for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前具有工作簿的写权限的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The name of the user who currently has write permission for the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 当前具有工作簿的写权限的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReserved%2A> property to determine whether the current workbook is write-reserved.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReserved%2A>属性来确定当前的工作簿是否受写保护。

trans-unit.source: If the workbook is not write-reserved, then the method sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WritePassword%2A> property to a password obtained through user input.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作簿不受写保护，则此方法将<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WritePassword%2A>获取通过用户输入的密码的属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReservedBy%2A> property to display the name of the user who saved the workbook as write-reserved.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.WriteReservedBy%2A>属性来显示该工作簿保存为写保留的用户的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the existence of a method named `GetPasswordFromUserInput` that obtains a strong password from user input.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定一个名为方法是否存在`GetPasswordFromUserInput`，从用户输入获取强密码。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: A uniform resource locator (URL) or a uniform naming convention (UNC) path to an XML data file.
trans-unit.target: 到 XML 数据文件的统一资源定位符 (URL) 或统一命名约定 (UNC) 路径。

trans-unit.source: The schema map to apply when importing the file.
trans-unit.target: 导入文件时应用的架构映射。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified for the <c>Destination</c> parameter, then this parameter specifies whether or not to overwrite data that has been mapped to the schema map specified in the <c>ImportMap</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 <c>Destination</c> 参数的值，则此参数指定是否覆盖已映射到在 <c>ImportMap</c> 参数中指定的架构映射的数据。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> to overwrite the data or <see langword="false" /> to append the new data to the existing data.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 可覆盖数据，设置为 <see langword="false" /> 可向现有数据追加新数据。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If a value is specified for the <c>Destination</c> parameter, then this parameter specifies whether or not to overwrite existing data.
trans-unit.target: 如果已指定 <c>Destination</c> 参数的值，则此参数指定是否覆盖现有数据。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> to overwrite existing data or <see langword="false" /> to cancel the import if data would be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 可覆盖现有数据，设置为 <see langword="false" /> 可在要执行数据覆盖时取消导入。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The data will be imported into a new XML list at the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 数据将导入指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 中的新 XML 列表。

trans-unit.source: Imports an XML data file into the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 数据文件导入当前工作簿。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlXmlImportResult" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlXmlImportResult" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Do not specify a value for the `Destination` parameter if you want to import data into an existing mapping.
trans-unit.target: 未指定的值`Destination`参数，如果你想要将数据导入现有的映射。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions will cause this method to generate run-time errors:
trans-unit.target: 以下情况将导致此方法以生成运行时错误：

trans-unit.source: The specified XML data contains syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 XML 数据包含语法错误。

trans-unit.source: The import process was cancelled because the specified data cannot fit into the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 导入过程已取消，因为指定的数据无法容纳到工作表。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A> method to import XML data that has been previously loaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A>方法导入以前加载到内存的 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> based on a schema generated from a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, writes the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to an XML file, and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImport%2A> method to write the data in the XML file to a range in worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>基于从生成的架构<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，写入<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到 XML 文件，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImport%2A>方法将 XML 文件中的数据写入工作表中的范围`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: The data to import.
trans-unit.target: 要导入的数据。

trans-unit.source: The schema map to apply when importing the file.
trans-unit.target: 导入文件时应用的架构映射。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified for the <c>Destination</c> parameter, then this parameter specifies whether or not to overwrite data that has been mapped to the schema map specified in the <c>ImportMap</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 <c>Destination</c> 参数的值，则此参数指定是否覆盖已映射到在 <c>ImportMap</c> 参数中指定的架构映射的数据。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> to overwrite the data or <see langword="false" /> to append the new data to the existing data.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 可覆盖数据，设置为 <see langword="false" /> 可向现有数据追加新数据。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If a value is specified for the <c>Destination</c> parameter, then this parameter specifies whether or not to overwrite existing data.
trans-unit.target: 如果已指定 <c>Destination</c> 参数的值，则此参数指定是否覆盖现有数据。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> to overwrite existing data or <see langword="false" /> to cancel the import if data would be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 可覆盖现有数据，设置为 <see langword="false" /> 可在要执行数据覆盖时取消导入。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The data will be imported into a new XML list in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 数据将导入指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> 中的新 XML 列表。

trans-unit.source: Imports an XML data stream that has been previously loaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 导入先前加载到内存中的 XML 数据流。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlXmlImportResult" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlXmlImportResult" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Do not specify a value for the `Destination` parameter if you want to import data into an existing mapping.
trans-unit.target: 未指定的值`Destination`参数，如果你想要将数据导入现有的映射。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions will cause this method to generate run-time errors:
trans-unit.target: 以下情况将导致此方法以生成运行时错误：

trans-unit.source: The specified XML data contains syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 XML 数据包含语法错误。

trans-unit.source: The import process was cancelled because the specified data cannot fit into the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 导入过程已取消，因为指定的数据无法容纳到工作表。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImport%2A> method to import an XML data file into the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImport%2A>方法以将 XML 数据文件导入到当前工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to import XML data into a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将 XML 数据导入工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> of customer names and adds an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> based on the XML schema for the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlMaps%2A> collection of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataSet>客户的名称，并将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>基于的 XML 架构<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlMaps%2A>当前工作簿的集合。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A> method to import the data into worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A>方法将数据导入到工作表`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A> method is called, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlImport> event handler prompts the user to either proceed with or cancel importing the XML, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlImport> event handler reports whether the XML was successfully imported.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A>调用方法时，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlImport>事件处理程序会提示用户继续还是取消导入 XML 中，与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlImport>事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导入了 XML。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMaps" /> collection that represents the schema maps that have been added to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMaps" /> 集合，该集合表示已添加到工作簿中的架构映射。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMaps" /> collection that represents the schema maps that have been added to the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMaps" /> 集合，表示已添加到工作簿中的架构映射。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to import XML data into a workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将 XML 数据导入工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> of customer names and adds an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap> based on the XML schema for the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlMaps%2A> collection of the current workbook.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataSet>客户的名称，并将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlMap>基于的 XML 架构<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlMaps%2A>当前工作簿的集合。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A> method to import the data into worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A>方法将数据导入到工作表`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A> method is called, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlImport> event handler prompts the user to either proceed with or cancel importing the XML, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlImport> event handler then reports whether the XML was successfully imported.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlImportXml%2A>调用方法时，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.BeforeXmlImport>事件处理程序会提示用户继续还是取消导入 XML 中，与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.AfterXmlImport>事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导入了 XML。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlNamespaces" /> collection that represents the XML namespaces contained in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlNamespaces" /> 集合，该集合表示工作簿中包含的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlNamespaces" /> collection that represents the XML namespaces contained in the workbook.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlNamespaces" /> 集合，表示工作簿中包含的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlNamespaces%2A> property to write the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for each <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlNamespace> in the workbook to column A of worksheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorkbookBase.XmlNamespaces%2A>属性用于每个写入统一资源标识符 (URI)<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XmlNamespace>到工作表的列的工作簿中`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: This example is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于文档级自定义。
